original: nākāśadhātuṃ
analyzed: na ākāśa dhātum
translated: They will not conceptualize the space element

original: vivikta iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: vivikte iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: as isolated.

original: na viviktam ākāśadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na vijñānadhātuṃ vivikta iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam ākāśa dhātuḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na vijñāna dhātum vivikte iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the space element as isolated.🔽They will not conceptualize consciousness as isolated.

original: na viviktaṃ vijñānadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāvidyāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam vijñāna dhātuḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na avidyām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the isolated as consciousness.🔽They will not conceptualize ignorance as empty.

original: na śūnyatām avidyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na saṃskārān śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām avidyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na saṃskārān śūnyāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as ignorance.🔽They will not conceptualize formations as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ saṃskārā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na vijñānaṃ śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām saṃskārāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na vijñānam śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as formations.🔽They will not conceptualize consciousness as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ vijñānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na nāmarūpaṃ śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām vijñānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na nāma rūpam śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as consciousness.🔽They will not conceptualize name-and-form as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ nāmarūpam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na ṣaḍāyatanaṃ śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām nāma rūpam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na ṣaṣ āyatanam śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as name-and-form.🔽They will not conceptualize the six sense sources as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ ṣaḍāyatanam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na sparśaṃ sūnya iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām ṣaṣ āyatanam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na sparśam sūnye iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the six sense sources.🔽They will not conceptualize contact as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ sparśa iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na vedanāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām sparśe iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na vedanām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as contact.🔽They will not conceptualize feeling as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ vedaneti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām vedanā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as feeling.

original: na tṛṣṇāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na tṛṣṇām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize craving as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ tṛṣṇeti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nopādānaṃ śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām tṛṣṇā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na upādānam śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as craving.🔽They will not conceptualize grasping as empty.

original: na śūnyatām upādānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na bhavaṃ śūnya iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām upādānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na bhavam śūnye iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as grasping.🔽They will not conceptualize becoming as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ bhava iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na jātiṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām bhave iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na jātim śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as becoming.🔽They will not conceptualize birth as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ jātir iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na jarāmaraṇaṃ sūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām jātiḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na jarā maraṇam sūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as birth.🔽They will not conceptualize old age and death as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ jarāmaraṇam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāvidyām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām jarā maraṇam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na avidyām ā animittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as old age and death.🔽They will not conceptualize ignorance as signless.

original: nānimittam avidyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na saṃskārān ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam avidyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na saṃskārān ā animittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the signless as ignorance.🔽They will not conceptualize volitional factors as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ saṃskārā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na vijñānam ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam saṃskārāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na vijñānam ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the signless as volitional factors.🔽They will not conceptualize consciousness as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ vijñānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam vijñānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the signless as consciousness.

original: na nāmarūpam ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na nāma rūpam ā nimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize name and form as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ nāmarūpam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na ṣaḍāyatanam ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam nāma rūpam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na ṣaṣ āyatanam ā nimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize name-and-form as signless.🔽They will not conceptualize the six sense sources as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na sparśam ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam ṣaṣ āyatanam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na sparśam ā nimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize signlessness as the six sense sources.🔽They will not conceptualize contact as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ sparśam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na vedanām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam sparśam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na vedanām ā animittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize signlessness as contact.🔽They will not conceptualize feeling as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ vedaneti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na tṛṣṇām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam vedanā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na tṛṣṇām ā nimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize signlessness as feeling.🔽They will not conceptualize craving as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ tṛṣṇeti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nopādānam ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam tṛṣṇā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na upādānam ā nimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize signlessness as craving.🔽They will not conceptualize grasping as signless.

original: nānimittam upādānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na bhavam ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam upādānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na bhavam ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize signlessness as grasping.🔽They will not conceptualize becoming as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ bhava iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na jātim ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam bhavaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na jātim ā animittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize signlessness as becoming.🔽They will not conceptualize birth as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ jātir iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam jātiḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize signlessness as birth.

original: na jarāmaraṇam ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na jarā maraṇam ā nimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize old age and death as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ jarāmaraṇam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāvidyām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam jarā maraṇam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na avidyām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize old age and death as not a sign.🔽They will not conceptualize ignorance as not a causal sign.

original: nāpraṇihitam avidyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam avidyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize not a causal sign as ignorance.

original: na saṃskārān apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāpraṇihitaṃ
analyzed: na saṃskārān apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na a praṇihitam
translated: They will not conceptualize the formative predispositions as not a causal sign.

original: saṃskārā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na vijñānam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: saṃskārāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na vijñānam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize not a causal sign as the formative predispositions.🔽They will not conceptualize consciousness as not a causal sign.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ vijñānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na nāmarūpam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam vijñānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na nāma rūpam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize not a causal sign as consciousness.🔽They will not conceptualize name and form as not a causal sign.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ nāmarūpam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na ṣaḍāyatanam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam nāma rūpam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na ṣaṣ āyatanam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize not a causal sign as name and form.🔽They will not conceptualize the six sense fields as not a causal sign.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na sparśam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam ṣaṣ āyatanam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na sparśam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize not a causal sign as the six sense fields.🔽They will not conceptualize contact as not a causal sign.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ sparśa iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na vedanām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam sparśe iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na vedanām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize not a causal sign as contact.🔽They will not conceptualize sensation as not a causal sign.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ vedaneti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam vedanā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize not a causal sign as sensation.

original: na tṛṣṇām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na tṛṣṇām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize craving as not a causal sign.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ tṛṣṇeti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nopādānam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam tṛṣṇā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na upādānam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-wishing as craving.🔽They will not conceptualize clinging as non-wishing.

original: nāpraṇihitam upādānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na bhavam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam upādānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na bhavam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-wishing as clinging.🔽They will not conceptualize becoming as non-wishing.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ bhava iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na jātim apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam bhave iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na jātim apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-wishing as becoming.🔽They will not conceptualize birth as non-wishing.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ jātir iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na jarāmaraṇam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam jātiḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na jarā maraṇam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-wishing as birth.🔽They will not conceptualize old age and death as non-wishing.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ jarāmaraṇam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāvidyām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam jarā maraṇam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na avidyām anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-wishing as old age and death.🔽They will not conceptualize ignorance as non-arising.

original: nānutpādam avidyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na saṃskārān anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam avidyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na saṃskārān anutpāde iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-arising as ignorance.🔽They will not conceptualize formations as non-arising.

original: nānutpādaṃ saṃskārā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na vijñānam anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam saṃskārāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na vijñānam anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-arising as formations.🔽They will not conceptualize consciousness as non-arising.

original: nānutpādaṃ vijñānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam vijñānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-arising as consciousness.

original: na nāmarūpam anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na nāma rūpam anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize name-and-form as non-arising.

original: nānutpādaṃ nāmarūpam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na ṣaḍāyatanam anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam nāma rūpam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na ṣaṣ āyatanam anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize name-and-form as not arising.🔽They will not conceptualize the six sense sources as not arising.

original: nānutpādaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na sparśam anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam ṣaṣ āyatanam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na sparśam anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize not arising as the six sense sources.🔽They will not conceptualize contact as not arising.

original: nānutpādaṃ sparśa iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na vedanām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam sparśaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na vedanām anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize not arising as contact.🔽They will not conceptualize feeling as not arising.

original: nānutpādaṃ vedaneti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na tṛṣṇām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam vedanā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na tṛṣṇām anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize not arising as feeling.🔽They will not conceptualize craving as not arising.

original: nānutpādaṃ tṛṣṇeti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nopādānam anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānutpādam upādānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam tṛṣṇā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na upādānam anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na anutpādam upādānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize not arising as craving.🔽They will not conceptualize grasping as not arising.🔽They will not conceptualize not arising as grasping.

original: na bhavam anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānutpādaṃ bhava iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na jātim anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na bhavam anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na anutpādam bhave iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na jātim anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize becoming as not arising.🔽They will not conceptualize not arising as becoming.🔽They will not conceptualize birth as not arising.

original: nānutpādaṃ jātir iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na jarāmaraṇam anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam jātiḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na jarā maraṇam anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize not arising as birth.🔽They will not conceptualize old age and death as not arising.

original: nānutpādaṃ jarāmaraṇam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam jarā maraṇam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize not arising as old age and death.

original: nāvidyām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na avidyām anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize ignorance as cessation.

original: nānirodham avidyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na saṃskārān anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham avidyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na saṃskārān anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize cessation as ignorance.🔽They will not conceptualize formations as cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ saṃskārā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na vijñānam anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham saṃskārāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na vijñānam anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize cessation as formations.🔽They will not conceptualize consciousness as cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ vijñānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na nāmarūpam anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na a nirodham vijñānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na nāma rūpam anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize cessation as consciousness.🔽They will not conceptualize name-and-form as cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ nāmarūpam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na ṣaḍāyatanam anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na a nirodham nāma rūpam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na ṣaṣ āyatanam anirodhaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize cessation as name-and-form.🔽They will not conceptualize the six sense bases as cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na sparśam anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānirodhaṃ sparśa iti
analyzed: na anirodham ṣaṣ āyatanam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na sparśam anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na a nirodham sparśaḥ iti
translated: They will not conceptualize cessation as the six sense bases.🔽They will not conceptualize contact as cessation.

original: vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na vedanām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: vikalpayiṣyanti  na vedanām anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize cessation as contact.🔽They will not conceptualize feeling as cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ vedaneti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na tṛṣṇām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānirodhaṃ tṛṣṇeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham vedanā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na tṛṣṇām anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na anirodham tṛṣṇā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize cessation as feeling.🔽They will not conceptualize craving as cessation.🔽They will not conceptualize cessation as craving.

original: nopādānam anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na upādānam anirodhaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize grasping as cessation.

original: nānirodham upādānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na bhavam anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham upādānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na bhavam anirodhaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize clinging as non-cessation.🔽They will not conceptualize becoming as non-cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ bhava iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na jātim anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham bhave iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na jātim anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-cessation as becoming.🔽They will not conceptualize birth as non-cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ jātir iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na jarāmaraṇam anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham jātiḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na jarā maraṇam anirodhaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-cessation as birth.🔽They will not conceptualize old age and death as non-cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ jarāmaraṇam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāvidyāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham jarā maraṇam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na avidyām śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-cessation as old age and death.🔽They will not conceptualize ignorance as peaceful.

original: na śāntam avidyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na saṃskārān śānta iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam avidyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na saṃskārān śāntaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize peace as ignorance.🔽They will not conceptualize volitional formations as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ saṃskārā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na vijñānaṃ śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam saṃskārāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na vijñānam śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize peace as volitional formations.🔽They will not conceptualize consciousness as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ vijñānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na nāmarūpaṃ śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam vijñānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na nāma rūpam śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize peace as consciousness.🔽They will not conceptualize name and form as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ nāmarūpam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na ṣaḍāyatanaṃ śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam nāma rūpam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na ṣaṣ āyatanam śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize peace as name and form.🔽They will not conceptualize the six sense sources as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam ṣaṣ āyatanam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize peace as the six sense sources.

original: na sparśaṃ śānta iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na sparśam śāntaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of contact as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ sparśa iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na vedanāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam sparśe iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na vedanām śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of peace as contact.🔽They will not conceive of feeling as peaceful.

original: na sāntaṃ vedaneti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na tṛṣṇāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na sa antam vedanā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na tṛṣṇām śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of peace as feeling.🔽They will not conceive of craving as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ tṛṣṇeti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nopādānaṃ śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam tṛṣṇā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na upādānam śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of peace as craving.🔽They will not conceive of grasping as peaceful.

original: na śāntam upādānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na bhavaṃ śānta iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam upādānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na bhavam śāntaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of peace as grasping.🔽They will not conceive of becoming as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ bhava iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na jātiṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam bhave iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na jātim śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of peace as becoming.🔽They will not conceive of birth as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ jātir iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na jarāmaraṇaṃ śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam jātiḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na jarā maraṇam śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of peace as birth.🔽They will not conceive of old age and death as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ jarāmaraṇam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāvidyāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam jarā maraṇam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na avidyām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of peace as old age and death.🔽They will not conceive of ignorance as isolated.

original: na viviktam avidyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na saṃskārān viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam avidyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na saṃskārān viviktāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of isolation as ignorance.🔽They will not conceive of volitional formations as isolated.

original: na viviktaṃ saṃskārā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam saṃskārāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of isolation as volitional formations.

original: na vijñānaṃ viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na vijñānam viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize consciousness as empty.

original: na viviktaṃ vijñānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na nāmarūpaṃ viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam vijñānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na nāma rūpam viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as consciousness.🔽They will not conceptualize name-and-form as empty.

original: na viviktaṃ nāmarūpam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na ṣaḍāyatanaṃ viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam nāma rūpam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na ṣaṣ āyatanam viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as name-and-form.🔽They will not conceptualize the six sense sources as empty.

original: na viviktaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na sparśaṃ vivikta iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam ṣaṣ āyatanam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na sparśam vivikte iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the six sense sources.🔽They will not conceptualize contact as empty.

original: na viviktaṃ sparśa iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na vedanāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam sparśe iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na vedanām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as contact.🔽They will not conceptualize feeling as empty.

original: na viviktaṃ vedaneti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na tṛṣṇāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam vedanā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na tṛṣṇām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as feeling.🔽They will not conceptualize craving as empty.

original: na viviktaṃ tṛṣṇeti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nopādānaṃ viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na viviktam upādānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam tṛṣṇā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na upādānam viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na viviktam upādānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as craving.🔽They will not conceptualize grasping as empty.🔽They will not conceptualize emptiness as grasping.

original: na bhavaṃ vivikta iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na viviktaṃ bhava iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na bhavam vivikte iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na viviktam bhave iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize becoming as empty.🔽They will not conceptualize emptiness as becoming.

original: na jātiṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na jātim viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize birth as empty.

original: na viviktaṃ jātir iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na jarāmaraṇaṃ viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam jātiḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na jarā maraṇam viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that birth is void.🔽They will not conceptualize that old age and death is void.

original: na viviktaṃ jarāmaraṇam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na dānapāramitāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam jarā maraṇam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na dāna pāramitām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that voidness is old age and death.🔽They will not conceptualize the perfection of giving as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ dānapāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na śīlapāramitāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām dāna pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na śīla pāramitām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the perfection of giving.🔽They will not conceptualize the perfection of morality as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ śīlapāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na kṣāntipāramitāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām śīla pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na kṣānti pāramitām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the perfection of morality.🔽They will not conceptualize the perfection of patience as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ kṣāntipāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na vīryapāramitāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām kṣānti pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na vīrya pāramitām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the perfection of patience.🔽They will not conceptualize the perfection of perseverance as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ vīryapāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na dhyānapāramitāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām vīrya pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na dhyāna pāramitām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the perfection of perseverance.🔽They will not conceptualize the perfection of concentration as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ dhyānapāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na prajñāpāramitāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām dhyāna pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na prajñāpāramitām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the perfection of concentration.🔽They will not conceptualize the perfection of wisdom as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ prajñāpāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām prajñāpāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the perfection of wisdom.

original: na dānapāramitām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na dāna pāramitām ā nimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe the perfection of generosity as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ dānapāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na śīlapāramitām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam dāna pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na śīla pāramitām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe signlessness as the perfection of generosity.🔽They will not construe the perfection of morality as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ śīlapāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na kṣāntipāramitām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam śīla pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na kṣānti pāramitām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe signlessness as the perfection of morality.🔽They will not construe the perfection of patience as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ kṣāntipāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na vīryapāramitām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam kṣānti pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na vīrya pāramitām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe signlessness as the perfection of patience.🔽They will not construe the perfection of effort as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ vīryapāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na dhyānapāramitām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam vīrya pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na dhyāna pāramitām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe signlessness as the perfection of effort.🔽They will not construe the perfection of concentration as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ dhyānapāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na prajñāpāramitām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam dhyāna pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na prajñāpāramitām ā nimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe signlessness as the perfection of concentration.🔽They will not construe the perfection of wisdom as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ prajñāpāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na dānapāramitām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam prajñāpāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na dāna pāramitām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe signlessness as the perfection of wisdom.🔽They will not construe the perfection of generosity as wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ dānapāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam dāna pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe wishlessness as the perfection of generosity.

original: na śīlapāramitām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śīla pāramitām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe the perfection of morality as non-entangled.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ śīlapāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na kṣāntipāramitām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam śīla pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na kṣānti pāramitām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe non-entanglement as the perfection of morality.🔽They will not construe the perfection of patience as non-entangled.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ kṣāntipāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na vīryapāramitām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam kṣānti pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na vīrya pāramitām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe non-entanglement as the perfection of patience.🔽They will not construe the perfection of effort as non-entangled.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ vīryapāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na dhyānapāramitām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam vīrya pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na dhyāna pāramitām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe non-entanglement as the perfection of effort.🔽They will not construe the perfection of concentration as non-entangled.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ dhyānapāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na prajñāpāramitām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam dhyāna pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na prajñāpāramitām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe non-entanglement as the perfection of concentration.🔽They will not construe the perfection of wisdom as non-entangled.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ prajñāpāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na dānapāramitām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam prajñāpāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na dāna pāramitām anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe non-entanglement as the perfection of wisdom.🔽They will not construe the perfection of giving as non-arisen.

original: nānutpādaṃ dānapāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na śīlapāramitām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam dāna pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na śīla pāramitām anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe non-arising as the perfection of giving.🔽They will not construe the perfection of morality as non-arisen.

original: nānutpādaṃ śīlapāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam śīla pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe non-arising as the perfection of morality.

original: na kṣāntipāramitām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na kṣānti pāramitām anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of the perfection of patience as non-arising.

original: nānutpādaṃ kṣāntipāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na vīryapāramitām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam kṣānti pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na vīrya pāramitām anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of non-arising as the perfection of patience.🔽They will not conceive of the perfection of effort as non-arising.

original: nānutpādaṃ vīryapāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na dhyānapāramitām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam vīrya pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na dhyāna pāramitām anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of non-arising as the perfection of effort.🔽They will not conceive of the perfection of concentration as non-arising.

original: nānutpādaṃ dhyānapāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na prajñāpāramitām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam dhyāna pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na prajñāpāramitām anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of non-arising as the perfection of concentration.🔽They will not conceive of the perfection of wisdom as non-arising.

original: nānutpādaṃ prajñāpāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam prajñāpāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of non-arising as the perfection of wisdom.

original: na dānapāramitām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na dāna pāramitām anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of the perfection of giving as non-cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ dānapāramiteti 🔽vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na śīlapāramitām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham dāna pāramitā iti  vikalpayiṣyanti  na śīla pāramitām anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of non-cessation as the perfection of giving.🔽They will not conceive of the perfection of morality as non-cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ śīlapāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na kṣāntipāramitām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānirodhaṃ kṣāntipāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham śīla pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na kṣānti pāramitām anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na anirodham kṣānti pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of non-cessation as the perfection of morality.🔽They will not conceive of the perfection of patience as non-cessation.🔽They will not conceive of non-cessation as the perfection of patience.

original: na vīryapāramitām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na vīrya pāramitām anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of the perfection of effort as non-cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ vīryapāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na dhyānapāramitām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham vīrya pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na dhyāna pāramitām anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe the perfection of perseverance as cessation.🔽They will not construe the perfection of concentration as cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ dhyānapāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na prajñāpāramitām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham dhyāna pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na prajñāpāramitām anirodhaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe cessation as the perfection of concentration.🔽They will not construe the perfection of wisdom as cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ prajñāpāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na dānapāramitāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham prajñāpāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na dāna pāramitām śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe cessation as the perfection of wisdom.🔽They will not construe the perfection of giving as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ dānapāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na śīlapāramitāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam dāna pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na śīla pāramitām śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe peaceful as the perfection of giving.🔽They will not construe the perfection of morality as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ śīlapāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na kṣāntipāramitāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam śīla pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na kṣānti pāramitām śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe peaceful as the perfection of morality.🔽They will not construe the perfection of patience as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ kṣāntipāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na vīryapāramitāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam kṣānti pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na vīrya pāramitām śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe peaceful as the perfection of patience.🔽They will not construe the perfection of perseverance as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ vīryapāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na dhyānapāramitāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam vīrya pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na dhyāna pāramitām śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe peaceful as the perfection of perseverance.🔽They will not construe the perfection of concentration as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ dhyānapāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam dhyāna pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe peaceful as the perfection of concentration.

original: na prajñāpāramitāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na prajñāpāramitām śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the perfection of wisdom as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ prajñāpāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na dānapāramitāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam prajñāpāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na dāna pāramitām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize peace as the perfection of wisdom.🔽They will not conceptualize the perfection of generosity as isolated.

original: na viviktaṃ dānapāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na śīlapāramitāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam dāna pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na śīla pāramitām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize isolation as the perfection of generosity.🔽They will not conceptualize the perfection of morality as isolated.

original: na viviktaṃ śīlapāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na kṣāntipāramitāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam śīla pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na kṣānti pāramitām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize isolation as the perfection of morality.🔽They will not conceptualize the perfection of patience as isolated.

original: na viviktaṃ kṣāntipāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na vīryapāramitāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam kṣānti pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na vīrya pāramitām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize isolation as the perfection of patience.🔽They will not conceptualize the perfection of effort as isolated.

original: na viviktaṃ vīryapāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na dhyānapāramitāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam vīrya pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na dhyāna pāramitām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize isolation as the perfection of effort.🔽They will not conceptualize the perfection of concentration as isolated.

original: na viviktaṃ dhyānapāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na prajñāpāramitāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam dhyāna pāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na prajñāpāramitām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize isolation as the perfection of concentration.🔽They will not conceptualize the perfection of wisdom as isolated.

original: na viviktaṃ prajñāpāramiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam prajñāpāramitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize isolation as the perfection of wisdom.

original: nādhyātmaśūnyatāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na adhyātma śūnyatām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize internal emptiness as empty.

original: na śūnyatām adhyātmaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām adhyātma śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as 'inner emptiness'.

original: na bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na bahirdhā śūnyatām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize outer emptiness as 'empty'.

original: na śūnyatāṃ bahirdhāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām bahirdhā śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as 'outer emptiness'.🔽They will not conceptualize inner and outer emptiness as 'empty'.

original: na śūnyatām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na śūnyatāśūnyatāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na śūnyatā aśūnyatām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as 'inner and outer emptiness'.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of emptiness as 'empty'.

original: na śūnyatāṃ śūnyatāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na mahāśūnyatāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām śūnyatā aśūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na mahāśūnyatām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as 'the emptiness of emptiness'.🔽They will not conceptualize great emptiness as 'empty'.

original: na śūnyatāṃ mahāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na paramārthaśūnyatāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām mahāśūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na paramārtha śūnyatām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as 'great emptiness'.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of the ultimate as 'empty'.

original: na śūnyatāṃ paramārthaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na śūnyatāṃ saṃskṛtaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām paramārtha śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na saṃskṛta śūnyatām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na śūnyatām saṃskṛtaśūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as 'the emptiness of the ultimate'.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of conditioned phenomena as 'empty'.🔽They will not conceptualize emptiness as 'the emptiness of conditioned phenomena'.

original: nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na asaṃskṛta śūnyatām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena as 'empty'.

original: na śūnyatām asaṃskṛtaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nātyantaśūnyatāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām asaṃskṛta śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na atyanta śūnyatām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of the ultimate as empty.

original: na śūnyatām atyantaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānavaragraśūnyatāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na śūnyatām anavarāgraśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām atyanta śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na an avaragra śūnyatām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na śūnyatām an avara agra śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of the beginningless and endless as empty.

original: nānavakāraśūnyatāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na śūnyatām anavakāraśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anavakāra śūnyatām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na śūnyatām anavakāraśūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the emptiness of the beginningless and endless.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of non-disappearance as empty.

original: na prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na prakṛti śūnyatām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the emptiness of non-disappearance.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of nature as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ prakṛtiśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām prakṛti śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na sarva dharma śūnyatām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the emptiness of nature.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of all phenomena as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ sarvadharmaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām sarva dharma śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of specific characteristics as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the emptiness of specific characteristics.

original: nānupalambhaśūnyatāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anupalambha śūnyatām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the emptiness of non-apprehension as empty.

original: na śūnyatām anupalambhaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nābhāvaśūnyatāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām anupalambha śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na abhāva śūnyatām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of non-existence as empty.

original: na śūnyatām abhāvaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām abhāva śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na svabhāva śūnyatām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the emptiness of non-existence.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of own-nature as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ svabhāvaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām svabhāva śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na abhāva svabhāva śūnyatām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the emptiness of own-nature.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of the non-existence of own-nature as empty.

original: na śūnyatām abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nādhyātmaśūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na adhyātma śūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the emptiness of the non-existence of own-nature.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of the internal as signless.

original: nānimittam adhyātmaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na bahirdhāśūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam adhyātma śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na bahirdhā śūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize signlessness as the emptiness of the internal.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of the external as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ bahirdhāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam bahirdhā śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatām ā nimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize signlessness as the emptiness of the external.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of the internal and external as signless.

original: nānimittam adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize signlessness as the emptiness of the internal and external.

original: na śūnyatāśūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatā aśūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the emptiness of emptiness as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ śūnyatāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na mahāśūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam śūnyatā aśūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na mahāśūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe emptiness of emptiness as not a sign.🔽They will not construe the great emptiness as not a sign.

original: nānimittaṃ mahāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na paramārthaśūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam mahāśūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na paramārtha śūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe not a sign as the great emptiness.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of ultimate reality as not a sign.

original: nānimittaṃ paramārthaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na saṃskṛtaśūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam paramārtha śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na saṃskṛta śūnyatām ā nimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe not a sign as the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of conditioned phenomena as not a sign.

original: nānimittaṃ saṃskṛtaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam saṃskṛta śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na asaṃskṛta śūnyatām ā nimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe not a sign as the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena as not a sign.

original: nānimittam asaṃskṛtaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nātyantaśūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam asaṃskṛta śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na atyanta śūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe not a sign as the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of the ultimate as not a sign.

original: nānimittam atyantaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānavarāgraśūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānimittam anavarāgraśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam atyanta śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na an avara agra śūnya tām ā nimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na animittam an avara agra śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe not a sign as the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of what is infinite as not a sign.

original: nānavakāraśūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anavakāra śūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe not a sign as the emptiness of what is infinite.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of what has no beginning or end as not a sign.🔽They will not construe not a sign as the emptiness of what has no beginning or end.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of non-rejection as not a sign.

original: nānimittam anavakāraśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na prakṛtiśūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam anavakāra śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na prakṛti śūnyatām ā nimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the emptiness of non-rejection as signless.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of inherent nature as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ prakṛtiśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na sarvadharmaśūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam prakṛti śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na sarva dharma śūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize signlessness as the emptiness of inherent nature.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of all phenomena as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ sarvadharmaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam sarva dharma śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize signlessness as the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of specific characteristics as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize signlessness as the emptiness of specific characteristics.

original: nānupalambhaśūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānimittam
analyzed: na anupalambha śūnyatām ā nimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na animittam
translated: They will not conceptualize the emptiness of non-apprehension as signless.🔽They will not conceptualize signlessness as

original: anupalambhaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nābhāvaśūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: anupalambha śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na abhāva śūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of non-existence as signless.

original: nānimittam abhāvaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na svabhāvaśūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānimittaṃ svabhāvaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam abhāva śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na svabhāva śūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na animittam svabhāva śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize signlessness as the emptiness of non-existence.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of own-nature as signless.🔽They will not conceptualize signlessness as the emptiness of own-nature.

original: nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na abhāva svabhāva śūnyatām ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the emptiness of the own-nature of non-existence as signless.

original: nānimittam abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nādhyātmaśūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na adhyātma śūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the emptiness of the nature of non-existence as not a sign.🔽They will not conceptualize internal emptiness as wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitam adhyātmaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na bahirdhāśūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam adhyātma śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na bahirdhā śūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize wishlessness as internal emptiness.🔽They will not conceptualize external emptiness as wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ bahirdhāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam bahirdhā śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize wishlessness as external emptiness.🔽They will not conceptualize internal and external emptiness as wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitam adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na śūnyatāśūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na śūnyatā aśūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize wishlessness as internal and external emptiness.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of emptiness as wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ śūnyatāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na mahāśūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam śūnyatā aśūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na mahāśūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize wishlessness as the emptiness of emptiness.🔽They will not conceptualize great emptiness as wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ mahāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na paramārthaśūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam mahāśūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na paramārtha śūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize wishlessness as great emptiness.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of the ultimate as wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ paramārthaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam paramārtha śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize wishlessness as the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: na saṃskṛtaśūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na saṃskṛta śūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe the emptiness of conditioned phenomena as non-wishing.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ saṃskṛtaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam saṃskṛta śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na asaṃskṛta śūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe non-wishing as the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena as non-wishing.

original: nāpraṇihitam asaṃskṛtaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nātyantaśūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam asaṃskṛta śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na atyanta śūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe non-wishing as the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of the ultimate as non-wishing.

original: nāpraṇihitam atyantaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānavarāgraśūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam atyanta śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na an avara agra śūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe non-wishing as the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of what is infinite as non-wishing.

original: nāpraṇihitam anavarāgraśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānavakāraśūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam an avara agra śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na anavakāra śūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe non-wishing as the emptiness of what is infinite.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of what is not rejected as non-wishing.

original: nāpraṇihitam anavakāraśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na prakṛtiśūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam anavakāra śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na prakṛti śūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe non-wishing as the emptiness of what is not rejected.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of nature as non-wishing.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ prakṛtiśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam prakṛti śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe non-wishing as the emptiness of nature.

original: na sarvadharmaśūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na sarva dharma śūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe the emptiness of all phenomena as non-wishing.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ sarvadharmaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam sarva dharma śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that the emptiness of all phenomena is not non-reliant.🔽They will not conceptualize that the emptiness of specific characteristics is not non-reliant.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānupalambhaśūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na anupalambha śūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that the non-reliant is the emptiness of specific characteristics.🔽They will not conceptualize that the emptiness of non-apprehension is not non-reliant.

original: nāpraṇihitam anupalambhaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nābhāvaśūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam anupalambha śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na abhāva śūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that the non-reliant is the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽They will not conceptualize that the emptiness of non-existence is not non-reliant.

original: nāpraṇihitam abhāvaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na svabhāvaśūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam abhāva śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na svabhāva śūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that the non-reliant is the emptiness of non-existence.🔽They will not conceptualize that the emptiness of own-nature is not non-reliant.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ svabhāvaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam svabhāva śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na abhāva svabhāva śūnyatām apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that the non-reliant is the emptiness of own-nature.🔽They will not conceptualize that the emptiness of the own-nature of non-existence is not non-reliant.

original: nāpraṇihitam abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nādhyātmaśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na adhyātma śūnyatām anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that the non-reliant is the emptiness of the own-nature of non-existence.🔽They will not conceptualize that the emptiness of the internal is non-arising.

original: nānutpādam adhyātmaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam adhyātma śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that non-arising is the emptiness of the internal.

original: na bahirdhāśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānutpādaṃ bahirdhāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na bahirdhā śūnyatām anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na anutpādam bahirdhā śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the emptiness of the external as non-production.🔽They will not conceptualize non-production as the emptiness of the external.

original: nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām
analyzed: na adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatām
translated: They will not conceptualize the emptiness of the external and internal

original: anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: as non-production.

original: nānutpādam adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na śūnyatāśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na śūnyatā aśūnyatām anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-production as the emptiness of the external and internal.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of emptiness as non-production.

original: nānutpādaṃ śūnyatāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na mahāśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam śūnyatā aśūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na mahāśūnyatām anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-production as the emptiness of emptiness.🔽They will not conceptualize great emptiness as non-production.

original: nānutpādaṃ mahāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na paramārthaśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam mahāśūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na paramārtha śūnyatām anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-production as great emptiness.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of the ultimate as non-production.

original: nānutpādaṃ paramārthaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na saṃskṛtaśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam paramārtha śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na saṃskṛta śūnyatām anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-production as the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of conditioned phenomena as non-production.

original: nānutpādaṃ saṃskṛtaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam saṃskṛta śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na asaṃskṛta śūnyatām anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-production as the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena as non-production.

original: nānutpādam asaṃskṛtaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam asaṃskṛta śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-production as the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: nātyantaśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na atyanta śūnyatām anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe the absolute emptiness as non-production.🔽They will not construe non-production as the absolute emptiness.

original: nānutpādam atyanaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānavarāgraśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānutpādam anavarāgraśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam vikalpayiṣyanti  na an avara agra śūnyatām anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na anutpādam an avara agra śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe the emptiness of beginningless and endless as non-production.🔽They will not construe non-production as the emptiness of beginningless and endless.

original: nānavakāraśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānutpādam anavakāraśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na prakṛtiśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anavakāra śūnyatām anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na anutpādam anavakāra śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na prakṛti śūnyatām anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe the emptiness of non-disappearance as non-production.🔽They will not construe non-production as the emptiness of non-disappearance.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of nature as non-production.

original: nānutpādaṃ prakṛtiśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na sarvadharmaśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam prakṛti śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na sarva dharma śūnyatām anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe non-production as the emptiness of nature.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of all phenomena as non-production.

original: nānutpādaṃ sarvadharmaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam sarva dharma śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatām anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe non-production as the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of specific characteristics as non-production.

original: nānutpādaṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānupalambhaśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na anupalambha śūnyatām anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe non-production as the emptiness of specific characteristics.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of non-apprehension as non-production.

original: nānutpādam anupalambhaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam anupalambha śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe non-production as the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: nābhāvaśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na abhāva śūnyatām anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the emptiness of non-existence as non-production.

original: nānutpādam abhāvaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na svabhāvaśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam abhāva śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na svabhāva śūnyatām anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-production as the emptiness of non-existence.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of own-nature as non-production.

original: nānutpādaṃ svabhāvaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam svabhāva śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na abhāva svabhāva śūnyatām anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-production as the emptiness of own-nature.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of the own-nature of non-existence as non-production.

original: nānutpādam abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nādhyātmaśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na adhyātma śūnyatām anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-production as the emptiness of the own-nature of non-existence.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of the internal as cessation.

original: nānirodham adhyātmaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na bahirdhāśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham adhyātma śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na bahirdhā śūnyatām anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize cessation as the emptiness of the internal.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of the external as cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ bahirdhāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham bahirdhā śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatām anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize cessation as the emptiness of the external.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of the internal and external as cessation.

original: nānirodham adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na śūnyatāśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na śūnyatā aśūnyatām anirodhaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize cessation as the emptiness of the internal and external.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of emptiness as cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ śūnyatāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham śūnyatā aśūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize cessation as the emptiness of emptiness.

original: na mahāśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na mahāśūnyatām anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe the great emptiness as cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ mahāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na paramārthaśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham mahāśūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na paramārtha śūnyatām anirodhaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe cessation as the great emptiness.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of ultimate reality as cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ paramārthaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na saṃskṛtaśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham paramārtha śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na saṃskṛta śūnyatām anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe cessation as the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of conditioned phenomena as cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ saṃskṛtaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham saṃskṛta śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na asaṃskṛta śūnyatām anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe cessation as the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena as cessation.

original: nānirodham asaṃskṛtaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti / 🔽nātyantaśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānirodham atyantaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham asaṃskṛta śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na atyanta śūnyatām anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na anirodham atyanta śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe cessation as the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of the endless as cessation.🔽They will not construe cessation as the emptiness of the endless.

original: nānavarāgraśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānirodham anavarāgraśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānavakāraśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na an avara agra śūnyatām anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na anirodham an avara agra śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na anavakāra śūnyatām anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe the emptiness of the beginningless and endless as cessation.🔽They will not construe cessation as the emptiness of the beginningless and endless.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of non-dispersal as cessation.

original: nānirodham anavakāraśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham anavakāra śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe cessation as the emptiness of non-dispersal.

original: na prakṛtiśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na prakṛti śūnyatām anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the emptiness of nature as cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ prakṛtiśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na sarvadharmaśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham prakṛti śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na sarva dharma śūnyatām anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize cessation as the emptiness of nature.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of all phenomena as cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ sarvadharmaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham sarva dharma śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatām anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize cessation as the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of its own mark as cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānupalambhaśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na anupalambha śūnyatām anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize cessation as the emptiness of its own mark.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of non-apprehension as cessation.

original: nānirodham anupalambhaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nābhāvaśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham anupalambha śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na abhāva śūnyatām anirodhaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize cessation as the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of non-existence as cessation.

original: nānirodham abhāvaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na svabhāvaśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham abhāva śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na svabhāva śūnyatām anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize cessation as the emptiness of non-existence.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of own-nature as cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ svabhāvaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham svabhāva śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na abhāva svabhāva śūnyatām anirodhaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize cessation as the emptiness of own-nature.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of the own-nature of non-existence as cessation.

original: nānirodham abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize cessation as the emptiness of the own-nature of non-existence.

original: nādhyātmaśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na adhyātma śūnyatām śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe the emptiness of internal phenomena as peaceful.

original: na śāntam adhyātmaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam adhyātma śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na bahirdhā śūnyatām śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe peace as the emptiness of internal phenomena.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of external phenomena as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ bahirdhāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam bahirdhā śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatām śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe peace as the emptiness of external phenomena.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of external and internal phenomena as peaceful.

original: na śāntam adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na śūnyatāśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na śūnyatā aśūnyatām śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe peace as the emptiness of external and internal phenomena.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of emptiness as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ śūnyatāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na mahāśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam śūnyatā a śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na mahāśūnyatām śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe peace as the emptiness of emptiness.🔽They will not construe great emptiness as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ mahāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na paramārthaśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam mahāśūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na paramārtha śūnyatām śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe peace as great emptiness.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of ultimate reality as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ paramārthaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na śāntaṃ saṃskṛtaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam paramārtha śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na saṃskṛta śūnyatām śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na śāntam saṃskṛta śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe peace as the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of conditioned phenomena as peaceful.🔽They will not construe peace as the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
