analyzed: na asaṃskṛta śūnyatām śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena as peaceful.

original: na śāntam asaṃskṛtaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam asaṃskṛta śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of the emptiness of the unconditioned as peaceful.

original: nātyantaśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na śāntam atyantaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na atyanta śūnyatām śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na śāntam atyanta śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of the emptiness of the ultimate as peaceful.🔽They will not conceive of the emptiness of the unconditioned as peaceful.

original: nānavarāgraśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na śāntam anavarāgraśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na an avara agra śūnya tām śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na śāntam an avara agra śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of the emptiness of the unlimited as peaceful.🔽They will not conceive of the emptiness of the unconditioned as peaceful.

original: nānavakāraśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na śāntam anavakāraśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anavakāra śūnyatām śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na śāntam anavakāra śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of the emptiness of the primordial as peaceful.🔽They will not conceive of the emptiness of the unconditioned as peaceful.

original: na prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na prakṛti śūnyatām śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of the emptiness of nature as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ prakṛtiśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam prakṛti śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na sarva dharma śūnyatām śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of the emptiness of the unconditioned as peaceful.🔽They will not conceive of the emptiness of all phenomena as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ sarvadharmaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam sarva dharma śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatām śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of the emptiness of the unconditioned as peaceful.🔽They will not conceive of the emptiness of specific characteristics as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānupalambhaśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na anupalambha śūnyatām śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of the emptiness of the unconditioned as peaceful.🔽They will not conceive of the emptiness of non-apprehension as peaceful.

original: na śāntam anupalambhaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam anupalambha śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of the emptiness of the unconditioned as peaceful.

original: nābhāvaśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na abhāva śūnyatām śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the emptiness of non-existence as peaceful.

original: na śāntam abhāvaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam abhāva śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na svabhāva śūnyatām śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize peace as the emptiness of non-existence.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of intrinsic nature as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ svabhāvaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam svabhāva śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na abhāva svabhāva śūnyatām śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize peace as the emptiness of intrinsic nature.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of the intrinsic nature of non-existence as peaceful.

original: na śāntam abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nādhyātmaśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na adhyātma śūnyatām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize peace as the emptiness of the intrinsic nature of non-existence.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of the internal as isolated.

original: na viviktam adhyātmaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam adhyātma śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na bahirdhā śūnyatām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize isolation as the emptiness of the internal.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of the external as isolated.

original: na viviktaṃ bahirdhāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam bahirdhā śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize isolation as the emptiness of the external.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of the internal and external as isolated.

original: na viviktam adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na śūnyatāśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na śūnyatā aśūnyatām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize isolation as the emptiness of the internal and external.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of emptiness as isolated.

original: na viviktaṃ śūnyatāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam śūnyatā a śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize isolation as the emptiness of emptiness.

original: na mahāśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na mahāśūnyatām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe the great emptiness as isolated.

original: na viviktaṃ mahāśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na paramārthaśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam mahāśūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na paramārtha śūnyatām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe isolation as the great emptiness.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of ultimate reality as isolated.

original: na viviktaṃ paramārthaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam paramārtha śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na saṃskṛta śūnyatām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe isolation as the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of conditioned phenomena as isolated.

original: na viviktaṃ saṃskṛtaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam saṃskṛta śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na asaṃskṛta śūnyatām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe isolation as the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena as isolated.

original: na viviktam asaṃskṛtaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nātyantaśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam asaṃskṛta śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na atyanta śūnyatām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe isolation as the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of the unlimited as isolated.

original: na viviktam atyantaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānavarāgraśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na viviktam anavarāgraśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam atyanta śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na an avara agra śūnyatām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na viviktam an avara agra śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe isolation as the emptiness of the unlimited.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of the endless and beginningless as isolated.

original: nānavakāraśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na viviktam anavakāraśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anavakāra śūnyatām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na viviktam anavakāraśūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe isolation as the emptiness of the endless and beginningless.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of non-discontinuity as isolated.

original: na prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na prakṛti śūnyatām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe isolation as the emptiness of non-discontinuity.🔽They will not construe the emptiness of inherent nature as isolated.

original: na viviktaṃ prakṛtiśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam prakṛti śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na sarva dharma śūnyatām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the emptiness of essential nature as isolated.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of all phenomena as isolated.

original: na viviktaṃ sarvadharmaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam sarva dharma śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the emptiness of all phenomena as not isolated.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of specific characteristics as isolated.

original: na viviktaṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānupalambhaśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na anupalambha śūnyatām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the emptiness of specific characteristics as not isolated.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of non-apprehension as isolated.

original: na viviktam anupalambhaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nābhāvaśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam anupalambha śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na abhāva śūnyatām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the emptiness of non-apprehension as not isolated.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of non-existence as isolated.

original: na viviktam abhāvaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam abhāva śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na svabhāva śūnyatām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the emptiness of non-existence as not isolated.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of own-nature as isolated.

original: na viviktaṃ svabhāvaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam svabhāva śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na abhāva svabhāva śūnyatām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the emptiness of own-nature as not isolated.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of the non-existence of own-nature as isolated.

original: na viviktam abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyateti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the emptiness of the non-existence of own-nature as not isolated.

original: na smṛtyupasthānāni śūnyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na smṛti upasthānāni śūnyāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the applications of mindfulness as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ smṛtyupasthānānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na smṛtyupasthānāny ānimittānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām smṛti upasthānāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na smṛti upasthānāni ā nimittāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the applications of mindfulness.🔽They will not conceptualize the applications of mindfulness as signless.

original: nānimittāṃ smṛtyupasthānānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na smṛtyupasthānāny apraṇihitānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittām smṛti upasthānāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na smṛti upasthānāni apraṇihitāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize signlessness as the applications of mindfulness.🔽They will not conceptualize the applications of mindfulness as wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ smṛtyupasthānānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na smṛtyupasthānāny anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam smṛti upasthānāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na smṛti upasthānāni anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize wishlessness as the applications of mindfulness.🔽They will not conceptualize the applications of mindfulness as non-arising.

original: nānutpādaṃ smṛtyupasthānānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na smṛtyupasthānāny anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam smṛti upasthānāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na smṛti upasthānāni anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-arising as the applications of mindfulness.🔽They will not conceptualize the applications of mindfulness as non-ceasing.

original: nānirodhaṃ smṛtyupasthānānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na smṛtyupasthānāni śāntānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham smṛti upasthānāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na smṛti upasthānāni śāntāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-ceasing as the applications of mindfulness.🔽They will not conceptualize the applications of mindfulness as calm.

original: na śāntaṃ smṛtyupasthānānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na smṛtyupasthānāni viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam smṛti upasthānāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na smṛti upasthānāni viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize calm as the applications of mindfulness.🔽They will not conceptualize the applications of mindfulness as void.

original: na viviktaṃ smṛtyupasthānānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam smṛti upasthānāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize voidness as the applications of mindfulness.

original: na samyakprahāṇāni śūnyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na samyakprahāṇāni śūnyāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the correct exertions as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ samyakprahāṇānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām samyakprahāṇāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the aspects of correct abandonment as emptiness.

original: na samyakprahāṇāny ānimittānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānimittaṃ samyakprahāṇānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na samyakprahāṇāny apraṇihitānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na samyakprahāṇāni ānimittāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na animittam samyakprahāṇāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na samyakprahāṇāni apraṇihitāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the aspects of correct abandonment.🔽They will not conceptualize the aspects of correct abandonment as signless.🔽They will not conceptualize signlessness as the aspects of correct abandonment.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ samyakprahāṇānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na samyakprahāṇāny anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam samyakprahāṇāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na samyakprahāṇāni anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the aspects of correct abandonment as wishless.🔽They will not conceptualize wishlessness as the aspects of correct abandonment.🔽They will not conceptualize the aspects of correct abandonment as non-production.

original: nānutpādaṃ samyakprahāṇānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na samyakprahāṇāny anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam samyakprahāṇāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na samyakprahāṇāni anirodhaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-production as the aspects of correct abandonment.🔽They will not conceptualize the aspects of correct abandonment as non-stopping.

original: nānirodhaṃ samyakprahāṇānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na samyakprahāṇāni śāntānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham samyakprahāṇāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na samyakprahāṇāni śāntāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-stopping as the aspects of correct abandonment.🔽They will not conceptualize the aspects of correct abandonment as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ samyakprahāṇānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na samyakprahāṇāni viviktānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam samyakprahāṇāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na samyakprahāṇāni viviktāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize peace as the aspects of correct abandonment.🔽They will not conceptualize the aspects of correct abandonment as isolated.

original: na viviktaṃ samyakprahāṇānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam samyakprahāṇāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize isolation as the aspects of correct abandonment.

original: narddhipādān śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na ṛddhipādān śūnyāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the bases of spiritual power as empty.

original: na śūnyatām ṛddhipādā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽narddhipādān ānimitta iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām ṛddhipādāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na ṛddhi pādān ā nimitte iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the bases of supernatural power.🔽They will not conceptualize the bases of supernatural power as signless.

original: nānimittam ṛddhipādā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽narddhipādān apraṇihita iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāpraṇihitam ṛddhipādā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam ṛddhipādāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na ṛddhipādān apraṇihitaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na apraṇihitam ṛddhipādāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize signlessness as the bases of supernatural power.🔽They will not conceptualize the bases of supernatural power as wishless.🔽They will not conceptualize wishlessness as the bases of supernatural power.

original: narddhipādān anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānutpādam ṛddhipādā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽narddhipādān anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na ṛddhipādān anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na anutpādam ṛddhipādāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na ṛddhipādān anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the bases of supernatural power as non-production.🔽They will not conceptualize non-production as the bases of supernatural power.🔽They will not conceptualize the bases of supernatural power as non-ceasing.

original: nānirodham ṛddhipādā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽narddhipādān śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham ṛddhipādāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na ṛddhipādān śāntāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-ceasing as the bases of supernatural power.🔽They will not conceptualize the bases of supernatural power as calm.

original: na śāntam ṛddhipādā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽narddhipādān viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam ṛddhipādāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na ṛddhipādān viviktāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize calm as the bases of supernatural power.

original: na viviktam ṛddhipādā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nendriyāṇi śūnyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na śūnyatām indriyāṇīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam ṛddhipādāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na indriyāṇi śūnyāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na śūnyatām indriyāṇi iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the bases of supernatural power as secluded.🔽They will not conceptualize seclusion as the bases of supernatural power.🔽They will not conceptualize the faculties as empty.🔽They will not conceptualize emptiness as the faculties.

original: nendriyāṇy ānimittānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na indriyāṇi ā nimittāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the faculties as signless.

original: nānimittam indriyāṇīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nendriyāṇy apraṇihitānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam indriyāṇi iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na indriyāṇi apraṇihitāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that the faculties are not without signs.🔽They will not conceptualize that the faculties are not without wishes.

original: nāpraṇihitam indriyāṇīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam indriyāṇi iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that the faculties are not without wishes.

original: nendriyāṇy anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānutpādam indriyāṇīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nendriyāṇy anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na indriyāṇi anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na anutpādam indriyāṇi iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na indriyāṇi anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that the faculties are non-arising.🔽They will not conceptualize that non-arising is the faculties.🔽They will not conceptualize that the faculties are non-ceasing.

original: nānirodham indriyāṇīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nendriyāṇi śāntānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham indriyāṇi iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na indriyāṇi śāntāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that non-ceasing is the faculties.🔽They will not conceptualize that the faculties are calm.

original: na śāntam indriyāṇīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nendriyāṇi viviktānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam indriyāṇi iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na indriyāṇi viviktāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that calm is the faculties.🔽They will not conceptualize that the faculties are secluded.

original: na viviktam indriyāṇīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na balāni śūnyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam indriyāṇi iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na balāni śūnyāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that secluded is the faculties.🔽They will not conceptualize that the powers are empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ balānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na balāny ānimittānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām balāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na balāni ānimittāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that emptiness is the powers.🔽They will not conceptualize that the powers are signless.

original: nānimittaṃ balānīti vikalpayiṣyanti / 🔽na balāny apraṇihitānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam balāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na balāni apraṇihitāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that signlessness is the powers.🔽They will not conceptualize that the powers are wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ balānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam balāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that wishlessness is the powers.

original: na balāny anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na balāni anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that the powers are non-arising.

original: nānutpādaṃ balānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na balāny anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam balāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na balāni anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-arising as the powers.🔽They will not conceptualize the powers as non-ceasing.

original: nānirodhaṃ balānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na balāni śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham balāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na balāni śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-ceasing as the powers.🔽They will not conceptualize the powers as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ balānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na balāni viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam balāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na balāni viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize peace as the powers.🔽They will not conceptualize the powers as secluded.

original: na viviktaṃ balānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na bodhyaṅgāni śūnyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam balāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na bodhyaṅgāni śūnyāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize seclusion as the powers.🔽They will not conceptualize the limbs of awakening as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ bodhyaṅgānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na bodhyaṅgāny ānimittānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām bodhyaṅgāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na bodhyaṅgāni ānimittāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the limbs of awakening.🔽They will not conceptualize the limbs of awakening as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ bodhyaṅgānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na bodhyaṅgāny apraṇihitānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam bodhyaṅgāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na bodhyaṅgāni apraṇihitāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the signless as the limbs of awakening.🔽They will not conceptualize the limbs of awakening as wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ bodhyaṅgānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na bodhyaṅgāny anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam bodhyaṅgāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na bodhyaṅgāni anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the wishless as the limbs of awakening.🔽They will not conceptualize the limbs of awakening as non-arising.

original: nānutpādaṃ bodhyaṅgānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam bodhyaṅgāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-arising as the limbs of awakening.

original: na bodhyaṅgāny anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na bodhyaṅgāni anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of the factors of awakening as cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ bodhyaṅgānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na bodhyaṅgāni śāntānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham bodhyaṅgāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na bodhyaṅgāni śāntāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of cessation as the factors of awakening.🔽They will not conceive of the factors of awakening as calm.

original: na śāntaṃ bodhyaṅgānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na bodhyaṅgāni viviktānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam bodhyaṅgāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na bodhyaṅgāni viviktāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of calm as the factors of awakening.🔽They will not conceive of the factors of awakening as refined.

original: na viviktaṃ bodhyaṅgānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ śūnyata iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam bodhyaṅgāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  nāryā aṣṭa aṅgam mārgam śūnyatas iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of refined as the factors of awakening.🔽They will not conceive of the noble eightfold path as emptiness.

original: na śūnyatām āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārga iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgam ānimitta iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām ārya aṣṭāṅgam mārgaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  nāryāṣṭāṅgam mārgam ā nimitte iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of emptiness as the noble eightfold path.🔽They will not conceive of the noble eightfold path as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārga iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam ārya aṣṭāṅgam mārgaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na āryāṣṭāṅgam mārgam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of signlessness as the noble eightfold path.🔽They will not conceive of the noble eightfold path as wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitam āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārga iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgam anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam ārya aṣṭāṅgam mārgaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na āryāṣṭāṅgam mārgam anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of wishlessness as the noble eightfold path.🔽They will not conceive of the noble eightfold path as not arisen.

original: nānutpādam āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārga iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam ārya aṣṭāṅgam mārgaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of the non-arisen as the noble eightfold path.

original: nāryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgam anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na āryāṣṭāṅgam mārgam anirodhaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will conceptualize the noble eightfold path as being without cessation.

original: nānirodham āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārga iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ śānta iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham ārya aṣṭāṅgam mārgaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  nāryā aṣṭāṅgam mārgam śāntaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will conceptualize that which is without cessation as the noble eightfold path.🔽They will conceptualize the noble eightfold path as being calm.

original: na śāntam āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārga iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ vivikta iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam ārya aṣṭāṅgam mārgaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  nāryā aṣṭa aṅgam mārgam vivikte iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will conceptualize that which is calm as the noble eightfold path.🔽They will conceptualize the noble eightfold path as being secluded.

original: na viviktam āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārga iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāryasatyāni śūnyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam ārya aṣṭāṅgam mārgaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  nāri asatyāni śūnyāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will conceptualize that which is secluded as the noble eightfold path.🔽They will conceptualize the noble truths as empty.

original: na śūnyatām āryasatyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāryasatyāny ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām ārya satyāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na ārya satyāni ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will conceptualize emptiness as the noble truths.🔽They will conceptualize the noble truths as signless.

original: nānimittam āryasatyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāryasatyāny apraṇihitānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam ārya satyāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na ārya satyāni apraṇihitāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will conceptualize the signless as the noble truths.🔽They will conceptualize the noble truths as wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitam āryasatyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāryasatyāny anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānutpādam āryasatyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam ārya satyāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na ārya satyāni anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na anutpādam ārya satyāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will conceptualize the wishless as the noble truths.🔽They will conceptualize the noble truths as non-production.🔽They will conceptualize non-production as the noble truths.

original: nāryasatyāny anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na ārya satyāni anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will conceptualize the noble truths as non-cessation.

original: nānirodham āryasatyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāryasatyāni śāntānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham ārya satyāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  nāri asatyāni śāntāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of the noble truths as non-cessation.🔽They will conceive of the noble truths as peaceful.

original: na śāntam āryasatyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāryasatyāni viviktānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam ārya satyāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  nāri asatyāni viviktāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will conceive of peace as the noble truths.🔽They will conceive of the noble truths as secluded.

original: na viviktam āryasatyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na dhyānāni śūnyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam ārya satyāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na dhyānāni śūnyāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will conceive of seclusion as the noble truths.🔽They will conceive of the concentrations as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ dhyānānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na dhyānāny ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām dhyānāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na dhyānāni ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will conceive of emptiness as the concentrations.🔽They will conceive of the concentrations as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ dhyānānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na dhyānāny apraṇihitānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam dhyānāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na dhyānāni apraṇihitāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will conceive of the signless as the concentrations.🔽They will conceive of the concentrations as wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ dhyānānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na dhyānāny anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam dhyānāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na dhyānāni anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will conceive of the wishless as the concentrations.🔽They will conceive of the concentrations as non-production.

original: nānutpādaṃ dhyānānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na dhyānāny anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam dhyānāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na dhyānāni anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will conceive of non-production as the concentrations.🔽They will conceive of the concentrations as non-cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ dhyānānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na dhyānāni śāntānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham dhyānāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na dhyānāni śāntāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will conceive of non-cessation as the concentrations.🔽They will conceive of the noble truths as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ dhyānānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam dhyānāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will conceive of peace as the noble truths.

original: na dhyānāni viviktānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na dhyānāni viviktāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that the concentrations are void.

original: na viviktaṃ dhyānānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāpramāṇāni śūnyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam dhyānāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na apramāṇāni śūnyāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that voidness is the concentrations.🔽They will not conceptualize that the formless [absorptions] are empty.

original: na śūnyatām apramāṇānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāpramāṇāny ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām apramāṇāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na apramāṇāni ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that emptiness is the formless [absorptions].🔽They will not conceptualize that the formless [absorptions] are signless.

original: nānimittam apramāṇānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāpramāṇāny apraṇihitānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam apramāṇāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na apramāṇāni apraṇihitāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that signlessness is the formless [absorptions].🔽They will not conceptualize that the formless [absorptions] are wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitam apramāṇānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāpramāṇāny anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam apramāṇāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na apramāṇāni anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that wishlessness is the formless [absorptions].🔽They will not conceptualize that the formless [absorptions] are non-arising.

original: nānutpādam apramāṇānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāpramāṇāny anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam apramāṇāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na apramāṇāni anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that non-arising is the formless [absorptions].🔽They will not conceptualize that the formless [absorptions] are non-ceasing.

original: nānirodham apramāṇānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāpramāṇāni śāntānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na śāntam apramāṇānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham apramāṇāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na apramāṇāni śāntāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na śāntam apramāṇāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that non-ceasing is the formless [absorptions].🔽They will not conceptualize that the formless [absorptions] are peaceful.🔽They will not conceptualize that peacefulness is the formless [absorptions].

original: nāpramāṇāni viviktānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apramāṇāni viviktāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that the formless [absorptions] are void.

original: na viviktam apramāṇānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam apramāṇāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that voidness is the formless [absorptions].🔽They will not conceptualize that the formless [absorptions] are isolated.🔽They will not conceptualize that isolation is the formless [absorptions].

original: nārūpyasamāpattīḥ śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na ārūpya samāpattīḥ śūnyāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the formless attainments as empty.

original: na śūnyatām ārūpyasamāpattaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nārūpyasamāpattīr ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām ārūpya samāpattaye iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na ārūpya samāpattīḥ ā nimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the formless attainments.🔽They will not conceptualize the formless attainments as signless.

original: nānimittam ārūpyasamāpattaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nārūpyasamāpattīr apraṇihitānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam ārūpya samāpattaye iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na ārūpya samāpattīḥ apraṇihitāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize signlessness as the formless attainments.🔽They will not conceptualize the formless attainments as wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitam ārūpyasamāpattaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nārūpyasamāpattīr anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam ārūpya samāpattaye iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na ārūpya samāpattīḥ anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize wishlessness as the formless attainments.🔽They will not conceptualize the formless attainments as non-arising.

original: nānutpādam ārūpyasamāpattaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nārūpyasamāpattīr anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam ārūpya samāpattaye iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na ārūpya samāpattīḥ anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-arising as the formless attainments.🔽They will not conceptualize the formless attainments as non-ceasing.

original: nānirodham ārūpyasamāpattaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nārūpyasamāpattīḥ śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham ārūpya samāpattaye iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na ārūpya samāpattīḥ śāntāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-ceasing as the formless attainments.🔽They will not conceptualize the formless attainments as calm.

original: na śāntam ārūpyasamāpattaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nārūpyasamāpattīr viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam ārūpya samāpattaye iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na ārūpya samāpattīḥ viviktāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize calm as the formless attainments.🔽They will not conceptualize the formless attainments as secluded.

original: na viviktam ārūpyasamāpattaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam ārūpya samāpattaye iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize seclusion as the formless attainments.

original: nāṣṭau vimokṣān śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na aṣṭau vimokṣān śūnyāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the eight liberations as empty.

original: na śūnyatām aṣṭau vimokṣā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāṣṭau vimokṣān ānimittā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na aṣṭau vimokṣān ānimittāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the eight liberations.🔽They will not conceptualize the eight liberations as signless.

original: nānimittam aṣṭau vimokṣā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāṣṭau vimokṣān apraṇihitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na aṣṭau vimokṣān apraṇihitāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize signlessness as the eight liberations.🔽They will not conceptualize the eight liberations as wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitam aṣṭau vimokṣā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāṣṭau vimokṣān anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na aṣṭau vimokṣān anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize wishlessness as the eight liberations.🔽They will not conceptualize the eight liberations as non-production.

original: nānutpādam aṣṭau vimokṣā iti 🔽vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāṣṭau vimokṣān anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ iti  vikalpayiṣyanti  na aṣṭau vimokṣān anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-production as the eight liberations.🔽They will not conceptualize the eight liberations as non-cessation.

original: nānirodham aṣṭau vimokṣā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāṣṭau vimokṣān śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na aṣṭau vimokṣān śāntāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-cessation as the eight liberations.🔽They will not conceptualize the eight liberations as calm.

original: na śāntam aṣṭau vimokṣā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāṣṭau vimokṣān viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na aṣṭau vimokṣān viviktāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize calm as the eight liberations.🔽They will not conceptualize the eight liberations as secluded.

original: na viviktam aṣṭau vimokṣā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize secluded as the eight liberations.

original: na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīḥ śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattīḥ śūnyāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the nine serial absorptions as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr ānimittā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattayaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattīḥ ā nimittāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the nine serial absorptions.🔽They will not conceptualize the nine serial absorptions as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr apraṇihitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattayaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattīḥ apraṇihitāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize signlessness as the nine serial absorptions.🔽They will not conceptualize the nine serial absorptions as wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattayaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattīḥ anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize wishlessness as the nine serial absorptions.🔽They will not conceptualize the nine serial absorptions as non-production.

original: nānutpādaṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattayaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattīḥ anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-production as the nine serial absorptions.🔽They will not conceptualize the nine serial absorptions as non-stopping.

original: nānirodhaṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattayaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-stopping as the nine serial absorptions.

original: na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīḥ śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattīḥ śāntāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the nine serial absorptions as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattayaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of the nine successive meditative absorptions as peaceful.

original: na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattīḥ viviktāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of the nine successive meditative absorptions as isolated.

original: na viviktaṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni śūnyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattayaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhāni śūnyāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of isolation as the nine successive meditative absorptions.🔽They will not conceive of the gateways to liberation—emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness—as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāny ānimittānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhāni ānimittāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of emptiness as the gateways to liberation—emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness.🔽They will not conceive of the gateways to liberation—emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness—as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāny apraṇihitānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhāni apraṇihitāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of signlessness as the gateways to liberation—emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness.🔽They will not conceive of the gateways to liberation—emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness—as wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of wishlessness as the gateways to liberation—emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness.

original: na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāny anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhāni anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of the gateways to liberation—emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness—as non-arising.

original: nānutpādaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāny anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhāni anirodhaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that the doors to liberation—emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness—are not non-arising.🔽They will not conceptualize that emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness are cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni śāntānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhāni śāntāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that the doors to liberation—emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness—are not cessation.🔽They will not conceptualize that the doors to liberation—emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness—are calm.

original: na śāntaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni viviktānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhāni viviktāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that calm is the doors to liberation—emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.🔽They will not conceptualize that the doors to liberation—emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness—are void.

original: na viviktaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nābhijñāḥ śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na abhijñāḥ śūnyāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that voidness is the doors to liberation—emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.🔽They will not conceptualize that the higher knowledges are empty.

original: na śūnyatām abhijñā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nābhijñā ānimittā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānimittam abhijñā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām abhijñāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na abhijñāḥ ānimittāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na animittam abhijñāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that emptiness is the higher knowledges.🔽They will not conceptualize that the higher knowledges are signless.🔽They will not conceptualize that signlessness is the higher knowledges.

original: nābhijñā apraṇihitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na abhijñāḥ apraṇihitāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that the higher knowledges are wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitam abhijñā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam abhijñāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of the absence of wishes as the superknowledges.🔽They will not conceive of the superknowledges as non-arising.

original: nābhijñā anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānutpādam 🔽abhijñā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nābhijñā anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na abhijñā anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na anutpādam  abhijñāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na abhijñā anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of non-arising as the superknowledges.🔽They will not conceive of the superknowledges as non-cessation.

original: nānirodham abhijñā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nābhijñāḥ śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham abhijñāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na abhijñāḥ śāntāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of non-cessation as the superknowledges.🔽They will not conceive of the superknowledges as calm.

original: na śāntam abhijñā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nābhijñā viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam abhijñāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na abhijñāḥ viviktāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of calm as the superknowledges.🔽They will not conceive of the superknowledges as secluded.

original: na viviktam abhijñā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na samādhīn śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam abhijñāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na samādhīn śūnyāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of secluded as the superknowledges.🔽They will not conceive of the concentrations as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ samādhaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na samādhīn ānimittā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām samādhayaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na samādhīn ā nimittāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of emptiness as the concentrations.🔽They will not conceive of the concentrations as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ samādhaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na samādhīn apraṇihitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam samādhayaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na samādhīn apraṇihitāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of the signless as the concentrations.🔽They will not conceive of the concentrations as wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ samādhaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na samādhīn anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam samādhayaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na samādhīn anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of the wishless as the concentrations.🔽They will not conceive of the concentrations as non-arising.

original: nānutpādaṃ samādhaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam samādhayaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of non-arising as the concentrations.

original: na samādhīn anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na samādhīn anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the concentrations as non-cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ samādhaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na samādhīn śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham samādhayaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na samādhīn śāntāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-cessation as the concentrations.🔽They will not conceptualize the concentrations as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ samādhaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na samādhīn viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam samādhayaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na samādhīn viviktāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize peace as the concentrations.🔽They will not conceptualize the concentrations as secluded.

original: na viviktaṃ samādhaya iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na dhāraṇīmukhāni śūnyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam samādhayaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na dhāraṇī mukhāni śūnyāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize seclusion as the concentrations.🔽They will not conceptualize the dhāraṇī gateways as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ dhāraṇīmukhānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na dhāraṇīmukhāny ānimittānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām dhāraṇī mukhāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na dhāraṇī mukhāni ānimittāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the dhāraṇī gateways.🔽They will not conceptualize the dhāraṇī gateways as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ dhāraṇīmukhānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na dhāraṇīmukhāny apraṇihitānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam dhāraṇī mukhāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na dhāraṇī mukhāni apraṇihitāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the signless as the dhāraṇī gateways.🔽They will not conceptualize the dhāraṇī gateways as wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ dhāraṇīmukhānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na dhāraṇīmukhāny anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānutpādaṃ dhāraṇīmukhānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam dhāraṇī mukhāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na dhāraṇī mukhāni anutpāde iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na anutpādam dhāraṇī mukhāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the wishless as the dhāraṇī gateways.🔽They will not conceptualize the dhāraṇī gateways as non-arising.🔽They will not conceptualize non-arising as the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: na dhāraṇīmukhāny anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na dhāraṇī mukhāni anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the dhāraṇī gateways as non-ceasing.

original: nānirodhaṃ dhāraṇīmukhānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na dhāraṇīmukhāni śāntānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na a nirodham dhāraṇī mukhāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na dhāraṇī mukhāni śāntāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of the dhāraṇī gateways as cessation.🔽They will not conceive of the dhāraṇī gateways as calm.

original: na śāntaṃ dhāraṇīmukhānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na dhāraṇīmukhāni viviktānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam dhāraṇī mukhāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na dhāraṇī mukhāni viviktāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of calm as the dhāraṇī gateways.🔽They will not conceive of the dhāraṇī gateways as void.

original: na viviktaṃ dhāraṇīmukhānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na daśatathāgatabalāni śūnyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam dhāraṇī mukhāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na daśa tathāgata balāni śūnyāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of voidness as the dhāraṇī gateways.🔽They will not conceive of the ten powers of the tathāgatas as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ daśatathāgatabalānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na daśatathāgatabalāny ānimittānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām daśa tathāgata balāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na daśa tathāgata balāni ānimittāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of emptiness as the ten powers of the tathāgatas.🔽They will not conceive of the ten powers of the tathāgatas as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ daśatathāgatabalānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na daśatathāgatabalāny apraṇihitānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam daśa tathāgata balāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na daśa tathāgata balāni apraṇihitāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of signlessness as the ten powers of the tathāgatas.🔽They will not conceive of the ten powers of the tathāgatas as wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ daśatathāgatabalānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na daśatathāgatabalāny anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānutpādaṃ daśatathāgatabalānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam daśa tathāgata balāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na daśa tathāgata balāni anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na anutpādam daśa tathāgata balāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of wishlessness as the ten powers of the tathāgatas.🔽They will not conceive of the ten powers of the tathāgatas as non-production.🔽They will not conceive of non-production as the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: na daśatathāgatabalāny anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na daśa tathāgata balāni anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of the ten powers of the tathāgatas as non-stopping.

original: nānirodhaṃ daśatathāgatabalānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na daśatathāgatabalāni śāntānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham daśa tathāgata balāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na daśa tathāgata balāni śāntāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of the ten powers of the Tathāgata as cessation.🔽They will not conceive of the ten powers of the Tathāgata as calm.

original: na śāntaṃ daśatathāgatabalānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na daśatathāgatabalāni viviktānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam daśa tathāgata balāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na daśa tathāgata balāni viviktāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of calm as the ten powers of the Tathāgata.🔽They will not conceive of the ten powers of the Tathāgata as void.

original: na viviktaṃ daśatathāgatabalānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na catvāri vaiśāradyāni śūnyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam daśa tathāgata balāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na catvāri vaiśāradyāni śūnyāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of voidness as the ten powers of the Tathāgata.🔽They will not conceive of the four fearlessnesses as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ catvāri vaiśāradyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na catvāri vaiśāradyāny ānimittānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām catvāri vaiśāradyāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na catvāri vaiśāradyāni ānimittāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of emptiness as the four fearlessnesses.🔽They will not conceive of the four fearlessnesses as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ catvāri vaiśāradyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na catvāri vaiśāradyāny apraṇihitānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam catvāri vaiśāradyāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na catvāri vaiśāradyāni apraṇihitāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of signlessness as the four fearlessnesses.🔽They will not conceive of the four fearlessnesses as wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ catvāri vaiśāradyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na catvāri vaiśāradyāny anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam catvāri vaiśāradyāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na catvāri vaiśāradyāni anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of wishlessness as the four fearlessnesses.🔽They will not conceive of the four fearlessnesses as non-arising.

original: nānutpādaṃ catvāri vaiśāradyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam catvāri vaiśāradyāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceive of non-arising as the four fearlessnesses.

original: na catvāri vaiśāradyāny anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na catvāri vaiśāradyāni anirodhaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the four fearlessnesses as cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ catvāri vaiśāradyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na catvāri vaiśāradyāni śāntānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham catvāri vaiśāradyāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na catvāri vaiśāradyāni śāntāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize cessation as the four fearlessnesses.🔽They will not conceptualize the four fearlessnesses as calm.

original: na śāntaṃ catvāri vaiśāradyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na catvāri vaiśāradyāni viviktānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na viviktaṃ catvāri vaiśāradyānīti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam catvāri vaiśāradyāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na catvāri vaiśāradyāni viviktāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na viviktam catvāri vaiśāradyāni iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ śūnyāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize calm as the four fearlessnesses.🔽They will not conceptualize the four fearlessnesses as void.

original: na śūnyatāṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvida iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na catasraḥ pratisaṃvida ānimittā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ ānimittāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize voidness as the four fearlessnesses.🔽They will not conceptualize the four fearlessnesses as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvida iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'praṇihitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ praṇihitāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize signlessness as the four fearlessnesses.🔽They will not conceptualize the four fearlessnesses as wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvida iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize wishlessness as the four fearlessnesses.

original: na catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'nutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ n utpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the four fearlessnesses as having no arising.

original: nānutpādaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvida iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'nirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ nirodhaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe the four analytical knowledges as non-arising.🔽They will not construe the four analytical knowledges as cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvida iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na a nirodham catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ śāntāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe non-arising as the four analytical knowledges.🔽They will not construe the four analytical knowledges as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvida iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na catasraḥ pratisaṃvido viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ viviktāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe cessation as the four analytical knowledges.🔽They will not construe the four analytical knowledges as secluded.

original: na viviktaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvida iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na mahākaruṇāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na mahā karuṇām śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe seclusion as the four analytical knowledges.🔽They will not construe great compassion as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ mahākaruṇeti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na mahākaruṇām ānimitteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām mahā karuṇā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na mahā karuṇām ānimittā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe emptiness as great compassion.🔽They will not construe great compassion as signless.

original: nānimittaṃ mahākaruṇeti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na mahākaruṇām apraṇihiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam mahā karuṇā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na mahā karuṇām apraṇihitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe signlessness as great compassion.🔽They will not construe great compassion as wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ mahākaruṇeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam mahā karuṇā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe wishlessness as great compassion.

original: na mahākaruṇām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na mahā karuṇām anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe great compassion as non-arising.

original: nānutpādaṃ mahākaruṇeti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na mahākaruṇām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam mahā karuṇā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na mahākaruṇām anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize great compassion as non-arising.🔽They will not conceptualize non-arising as great compassion.🔽They will not conceptualize great compassion as cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ mahākaruṇeti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na mahākaruṇāṃ śānteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham mahā karuṇā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na mahā karuṇām śānta iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize cessation as great compassion.🔽They will not conceptualize great compassion as peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ mahākaruṇeti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na mahākaruṇāṃ vivikteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam mahā karuṇā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na mahā karuṇām viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize peaceful as great compassion.🔽They will not conceptualize great compassion as secluded.

original: na viviktaṃ mahākaruṇeti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam mahā karuṇā iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na aṣṭādaśa āveṇika buddha dharmān śūnyāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize secluded as great compassion.🔽They will not conceptualize the eighteen distinctive qualities of the Buddha as empty.

original: na śūnyatām aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān ānimittā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām aṣṭādaśa āveṇika buddha dharmāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na aṣṭādaśa āveṇika buddha dharmān ā nimittāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the eighteen distinctive qualities of the Buddha.🔽They will not conceptualize the eighteen distinctive qualities of the Buddha as signless.

original: nānimittam aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā 🔽iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān apraṇihitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam aṣṭādaśa āveṇika buddha dharmāḥ  iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na aṣṭādaśa āveṇika buddha dharmān apraṇihitāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize signlessness as the eighteen distinctive qualities of the Buddha.🔽They will not conceptualize the eighteen distinctive qualities of the Buddha as wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitam aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam aṣṭādaśa āveṇika buddha dharmāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize wishlessness as the eighteen distinctive qualities of the Buddha.

original: nāṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na aṣṭādaśa āveṇika buddha dharmān anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas as non-arising.

original: nānutpādam aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam aṣṭādaśa āveṇika buddha dharmāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na aṣṭādaśa āveṇika buddha dharmān anirodhe iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe non-arising as the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.🔽They will not construe the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas as non-ceasing.

original: nānirodham aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān śāntā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham aṣṭādaśa āveṇika buddha dharmāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na aṣṭādaśa āveṇika buddha dharmān śāntāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe non-ceasing as the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.🔽They will not construe the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas as calm.

original: na śāntam aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān viviktā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam aṣṭādaśa āveṇika buddha dharmāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na aṣṭādaśa āveṇika buddha dharmān viviktāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe calm as the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.🔽They will not construe the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas as void.

original: na viviktam aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na srotaāpattiphalaṃ śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam aṣṭādaśa āveṇika buddha dharmāḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na srotaāpatti phalam śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe voidness as the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.🔽They will not construe the result of stream enterer as empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ srotaāpattiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na srotaāpattiphalam ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām srotaāpatti phalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na srotaāpatti phalam ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe emptiness as the result of stream enterer.🔽They will not construe the result of stream enterer as signless.

original: na ānimittaṃ srotaāpattiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na ā nimittam srotaāpatti phalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not construe signlessness as the result of stream enterer.

original: na srotaāpattiphalam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na srotaāpatti phalam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that the fruit of stream-entry is not wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ srotaāpattiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na srotaāpattiphalam anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam srotaāpatti phalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na srotaāpatti phalam anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that wishlessness is the fruit of stream-entry.🔽They will not conceptualize that the fruit of stream-entry is non-arising.

original: nānutpādaṃ srotaāpattiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na srotaāpattiphalam anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam srotaāpatti phalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na srotaāpatti phalam anirodhaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that non-arising is the fruit of stream-entry.🔽They will not conceptualize that the fruit of stream-entry is non-ceasing.

original: nānirodhaṃ srotaāpattiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na srotaāpattiphalaṃ śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham srotaāpatti phalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na srotaāpatti phalam śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that non-ceasing is the fruit of stream-entry.🔽They will not conceptualize that the fruit of stream-entry is peaceful.

original: na śāntaṃ srotaāpattiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na srotaāpattiphalaṃ viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam srotaāpatti phalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na srotaāpatti phalam viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that peacefulness is the fruit of stream-entry.🔽They will not conceptualize that the fruit of stream-entry is secluded.

original: na viviktaṃ srotaāpattiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam srotaāpatti phalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na sakṛdāgāmi phalam śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that seclusion is the fruit of stream-entry.🔽They will not conceptualize that the fruit of once-returning is empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām sakṛdāgāmi phalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that emptiness is the fruit of once-returning.

original: na sakṛdāgāmiphalam ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na sakṛdāgāmi phalam ā nimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that the fruit of once-returning is signless.

original: nānimittaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam sakṛdāgāmi phalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the fruit of being a once-returner as not a sign.

original: na sakṛdāgāmiphalam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāpraṇihitaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na sakṛdāgāmiphalam anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na sakṛdāgāmi phalam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na apraṇihitam sakṛdāgāmi phalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na sakṛdāgāmi phalam anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the fruit of being a once-returner as wishless.🔽They will not conceptualize wishlessness as the fruit of being a once-returner.🔽They will not conceptualize the fruit of being a once-returner as non-production.

original: nānutpādaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na sakṛdāgāmiphalam anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam sakṛdāgāmi phalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na sakṛdāgāmi phalam anirodhaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-production as the fruit of being a once-returner.🔽They will not conceptualize the fruit of being a once-returner as non-cessation.

original: nānirodhaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham sakṛdāgāmi phalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na sakṛdāgāmi phalam śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize non-cessation as the fruit of being a once-returner.🔽They will not conceptualize the fruit of being a once-returner as calm.

original: na śāntaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam sakṛdāgāmi phalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na sakṛdāgāmi phalam viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize calm as the fruit of being a once-returner.🔽They will not conceptualize the fruit of being a once-returner as secluded.

original: na viviktaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānāgāmiphalaṃ śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam sakṛdāgāmi phalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  nānāgāmi phalam śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize secluded as the fruit of being a once-returner.🔽They will not conceptualize the fruit of being a non-returner as empty.

original: na śūnyatām anāgāmiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām anāgāmi phalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize emptiness as the fruit of being a non-returner.

original: nānāgāmiphalam ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anāgāmi phalam ā nimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize the fruit of being a non-returner as signless.

original: nānimittam anāgāmiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānāgāmiphalam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam anāgāmi phalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  nānāgāmi phalam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that the fruit of non-returning is signless.🔽They will not conceptualize that the fruit of non-returning is wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitam anāgāmiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti / 🔽nānāgāmiphalam anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam anāgāmi phalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na anāgāmi phalam anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that the wishless is the fruit of non-returning.

original: nānutpādam anāgāmiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānāgāmiphalam anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anutpādam anāgāmi phalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na anāgāmi phalam anirodhaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that the fruit of non-returning is non-arising.🔽They will not conceptualize that non-arising is the fruit of non-returning.🔽They will not conceptualize that the fruit of non-returning is non-ceasing.

original: nānirodham anāgāmiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānāgāmiphalaṃ śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham anāgāmi phalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na anāgāmi phalam śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that non-ceasing is the fruit of non-returning.🔽They will not conceptualize that the fruit of non-returning is peaceful.

original: na śāntam anāgāmiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānāgāmiphalaṃ viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam anāgāmi phalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  nānāgāmi phalam viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that peace is the fruit of non-returning.🔽They will not conceptualize that the fruit of non-returning is secluded.

original: na viviktam anāgāmiphalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nārhattvaṃ śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam anāgāmi phalam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na arhat tvam śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that seclusion is the fruit of non-returning.🔽They will not conceptualize that arhatship is empty.

original: na śūnyatām arhattvam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nārhattvam ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām arhat tvam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na arhat tvam ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that emptiness is arhatship.🔽They will not conceptualize that arhatship is signless.

original: nānimittam arhattvam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na animittam arhat tvam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that the signless is arhatship.

original: nārhattvam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nāpraṇihitam arhattvam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na arhat tvam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na apraṇihitam arhat tvam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that arhatship is not intentional.🔽They will not conceptualize that not intentional is arhatship.

original: nārhattvam anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānutpādam arhattvam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nārhattvam anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na arhat tvam anutpādaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na anutpādam arhat tvam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na arhat tvam anirodhaḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that arhatship is non-arising.🔽They will not conceptualize that non-arising is arhatship.🔽They will not conceptualize that arhatship is non-ceasing.

original: nānirodham arhattvam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nārhattvaṃ śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na anirodham arhat tvam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na arhat tvam śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that non-ceasing is arhatship.🔽They will not conceptualize that arhatship is peaceful.

original: na śāntam arhattvam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nārhattvaṃ viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śāntam arhat tvam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na arhat tvam viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that peaceful is arhatship.🔽They will not conceptualize that arhatship is secluded.

original: na viviktam arhattvam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na pratyekabodhiṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na viviktam arhat tvam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na pratyeka bodhim śūnyā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that secluded is arhatship.🔽They will not conceptualize that individual enlightenment is empty.

original: na śūnyatāṃ pratyekabodhir iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽na pratyekabodhim ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti /🔽nānimittaṃ pratyekabodhir iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na śūnyatām pratyeka bodhiḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na pratyeka bodhim ā nimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti  na animittam pratyeka bodhiḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that emptiness is individual enlightenment.🔽They will not conceptualize that individual enlightenment is signless.🔽They will not conceptualize that signlessness is individual enlightenment.

original: na pratyekabodhim apraṇihiteti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na pratyeka bodhim apraṇihitā iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that individual enlightenment is wishless.

original: nāpraṇihitaṃ pratyekabodhir iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
analyzed: na apraṇihitam pratyeka bodhiḥ iti vikalpayiṣyanti
translated: They will not conceptualize that the wishless is the individual enlightenment.
