translated: The dharmatā of mental contact is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.

original: na tathāgate cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatopalabhyate /🔽na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatā upalabhyate  na cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.

original: na tathāgate cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatopalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tā upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: na śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na śrotra saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not found in the suchness of ear-contact-born feeling.

original: na tathāgate śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatopalabhyate /🔽na śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate śrotra saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatā upalabhyate  na śrotra saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of ear-contact-born feeling is not found in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not found in the dharmatā of ear-contact-born feeling.

original: na tathāgate śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatopalabhyate / 🔽na ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate śrotra saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharmatā upalabhyate  na ghrāṇa saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of ear-contact-born feeling is not found in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not found in the suchness of nose-contact-born feeling.

original: na tathāgate ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatopalabhyate /🔽na ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate ghrāṇa saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatā upalabhyate  na ghrāṇa saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of nose-contact-born feeling is not found in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not found in the dharmatā of nose-contact-born feeling.

original: na tathāgate ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatopalabhyate /🔽na jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate ghrāṇa saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tā upalabhyate  na jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of nose-contact-born feeling is not found in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not found in the suchness of tongue-contact-born feeling.

original: na tathāgate jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatopalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatā upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of tongue-contact-born feeling is not found in the Tathāgata.

original: na jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not found in the reality of the sensation that arises from the contact with the tongue.

original: na tathāgate jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatopalabhyate /🔽na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tā upalabhyate  na kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The reality of the sensation that arises from the contact with the tongue is not found in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not found in the suchness of the sensation that arises from the contact with the body.

original: na tathāgate kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatopalabhyate /🔽na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatā upalabhyate  na kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the sensation that arises from the contact with the body is not found in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not found in the reality of the sensation that arises from the contact with the body.

original: na tathāgate kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatopalabhyate /🔽na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tā upalabhyate  na manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The reality of the sensation that arises from the contact with the body is not found in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not found in the suchness of the sensation that arises from the contact with the mind.

original: na tathāgate manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatopalabhyate /🔽na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatā upalabhyate  na manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the sensation that arises from the contact with the mind is not found in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not found in the reality of the sensation that arises from the contact with the mind.

original: na tathāgate manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatopalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tā upalabhyate
translated: The reality of the sensation that arises from the contact with the mind is not found in the Tathāgata.

original: na pṛthivīdhātutathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na pṛthivī dhātu tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not found in the suchness of the earth element.

original: na tathāgate pṛthivīdhātutathatopalabhyate /🔽na pṛthivīdhātudharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate pṛthivī dhātu tathatā upalabhyate  na pṛthivī dhātu dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the suchness of the earth element.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the earth element.

original: na tathāgate pṛthivīdhātudharmatopalabhyate /🔽nābdhātutathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate pṛthivī dhātu dharmatā upalabhyate  na ap dhātu tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the suchness of the earth element.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the suchness of the water element.

original: na tathāgate 'bdhātutathatopalabhyate /🔽nābdhātudharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate b dhātu tathatā upalabhyate  na ap dhātu dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the suchness of the water element.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the water element.

original: na tathāgate 'bdhātudharmatopalabhyate /🔽na tejodhātutathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate b dhātu dharmatā upalabhyate  na tejaḥ dhātu tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the water element.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the suchness of the fire element.

original: na tathāgate tejodhātutathatopalabhyate /🔽na tejodhātudharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate tejaḥ dhātu tathatā upalabhyate  na tejaḥ dhātu dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the suchness of the fire element.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the fire element.

original: na tathāgate tejodhātudharmatopalabhyate /🔽na vāyudhātutathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate tejaḥ dhātu dharmatā upalabhyate  na vāyu dhātu tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the fire element.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the suchness of the wind element.

original: na tathāgate vāyudhātutathatopalabhyate /🔽na vāyudhātudharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate vāyu dhātu tathatā upalabhyate  na vāyu dhātu dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the suchness of the wind element.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the wind element.

original: na tathāgate vāyudhātudharmatopalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate vāyu dhātu dharmatā upalabhyate
translated: The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the wind element.

original: nākāśadhātutathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na ākāśa dhātu tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the space element.

original: na tathāgata ākāśadhātutathatopalabhyate /🔽nākāśadhātudharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgataḥ ākāśa dhātu tathatā upalabhyate  na ākāśa dhātu dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the space element is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the space element.

original: na tathāgata ākāśadhātudharmatopalabhyate /🔽na vijñānadhātutathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate ākāśa dhātu dharmatā upalabhyate  na vijñāna dhātu tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of the space element is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the consciousness element.

original: na tathāgate vijñānadhātutathatopalabhyate /🔽na vijñānadhātudharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate vijñāna dhātu tathatā upalabhyate  na vijñāna dhātu dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the consciousness element is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the consciousness element.

original: na tathāgate vijñānadhātudharmatopalabhyate /🔽nāvidyātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate vijñāna dhātu dharmatā upalabhyate  na avidyā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of the consciousness element is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of ignorance.

original: na tathāgate 'vidyātathatopalabhyate /🔽nāvidyādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /🔽na tathāgate
analyzed: na tathāgate vidyā tathatā upalabhyate  na avidyā dharma tāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate  na tathāgate
translated: The suchness of ignorance is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of ignorance.

original: 'vidyādharmatopalabhyate /🔽na saṃskāratathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: vidyā dharma tā upalabhyate  na saṃskāra tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of ignorance.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of volitional formations.

original: na tathāgate saṃskāratathatopalabhyate /🔽na saṃskāradharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate saṃskāra tathatā upalabhyate  na saṃskāra dharma tāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of volitional formations is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of volitional formations.

original: na tathāgate saṃskāradharmatopalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate saṃskāra dharma tā upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of volitional formations is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: na vijñānatathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na vijñāna tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of consciousness.

original: na tathāgate vijñānatathatopalabhyate /🔽na vijñānadharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate vijñāna tathatā upalabhyate  na vijñāna dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of consciousness is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of consciousness.

original: na tathāgate vijñānadharmatopalabhyate /🔽na nāmarūpatathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate vijñāna dharmatā upalabhyate  na nāma rūpa tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of consciousness is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of name-and-form.

original: na tathāgate nāmarūpatathatopalabhyate /🔽na nāmarūpadharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate nāma rūpa tathatā upalabhyate  na nāma rūpa dharma tāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of name-and-form is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of name-and-form.

original: na tathāgate nāmarūpadharmatopalabhyate /🔽na ṣaḍāyatanatathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate nāma rūpa dharmatā upalabhyate  na ṣaṣ āyatana tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of name-and-form is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the six sense bases.

original: na tathāgate ṣaḍāyatanatathatopalabhyate /🔽na ṣaḍāyatanadharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate ṣaṣ āyatana tathatā upalabhyate  na ṣaṣ āyatana dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the six sense bases is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the six sense bases.

original: na tathāgate ṣaḍāyatanadharmatopalabhyate /🔽na sparśatathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate ṣaṣ āyatana dharmatā upalabhyate  na sparśa tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of the six sense bases is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of contact.

original: na tathāgate sparśatathatopalabhyate /🔽na sparśadharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate sparśa tathatā upalabhyate  na sparśa dharma tāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of contact is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of contact.

original: na tathāgate sparśadharmatopalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate sparśa dharma tā upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of contact is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: na vedanātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na vedanā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of feeling.

original: na tathāgate vedanātathatopalabhyate /🔽na vedanādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate vedanā tathatā upalabhyate  na vedanā dharma tāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of feeling is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of feeling.

original: na tathāgate vedanādharmatopalabhyate /🔽na tṛṣṇātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate vedanā dharma tā upalabhyate  na tṛṣṇā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of feeling is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of craving.

original: na tathāgate tṛṣṇātathatopalabhyate /🔽na tṛṣṇādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate tṛṣṇā tathatā upalabhyate  na tṛṣṇā dharma tāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of craving is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of craving.

original: na tathāgate tṛṣṇādharmatopalabhyate /🔽nopādānatathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate tṛṣṇā dharma tā upalabhyate  na upādāna tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of craving is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of grasping.

original: na tathāgata upādānatathatopalabhyate /🔽nopādānadharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate upādāna tathatā upalabhyate  na upādāna dharma tāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of grasping is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of grasping.

original: na tathāgata upādānadharmatopalabhyate /🔽na bhavatathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate upādāna dharma tā upalabhyate  na bhava tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of grasping is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of becoming.

original: na tathāgate bhavatathatopalabhyate /🔽na bhavadharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate bhava tathatā upalabhyate  na bhava dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of becoming is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of becoming.

original: na tathāgate bhavadharmatopalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate bhava dharma tā upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of becoming is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: na jātitathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na jāti tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of birth.

original: na tathāgate jātitathatopalabhyate /🔽na jātidharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate jāti tathatā upalabhyate  na jāti dharma tāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the suchness of birth.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the dharmatā of birth.

original: na tathāgate jātidharmatopalabhyate /🔽na jarāmaraṇatathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate jāti dharmatā upalabhyate  na jarā maraṇa tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of birth is not apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the suchness of old age and death.

original: na tathāgate jarāmaraṇatathatopalabhyate /🔽na jarāmaraṇadharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate jarā maraṇa tathatā upalabhyate  na jarā maraṇa dharma tāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of old age and death is not apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the dharmatā of old age and death.

original: na tathāgate jarāmaraṇadharmatopalabhyate /🔽na dānapāramitātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate jarā maraṇa dharmatā upalabhyate  na dāna pāramitā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of old age and death is not apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the suchness of the perfection of giving.

original: na tathāgate dānapāramitātathatopalabhyate /🔽na dānapāramitādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate dāna pāramitā tathatā upalabhyate  na dāna pāramitā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the perfection of giving is not apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the perfection of giving.

original: na tathāgate dānapāramitādharmatopalabhyate /🔽na śīlapāramitātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate dāna pāramitā dharma tā upalabhyate  na śīla pāramitā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of the perfection of giving is not apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the suchness of the perfection of morality.

original: na tathāgate śīlapāramitātathatopalabhyate /🔽na śīlapāramitādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate śīla pāramitā tathatā upalabhyate  na śīla pāramitā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the perfection of morality is not apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the perfection of morality.

original: na tathāgate śīlapāramitādharmatopalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate śīla pāramitā dharma tā upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of the perfection of morality is not apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.

original: na kṣāntipāramitātathatāyāṃ 🔽tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na kṣānti pāramitā tathatāyām  tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not found in the suchness of the perfection of patience.

original: na tathāgate kṣāntipāramitātathatopalabhyate /🔽na kṣāntipāramitādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate kṣānti pāramitā tathatā upalabhyate  na kṣānti pāramitā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the perfection of patience is not found in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not found in the true nature of the perfection of patience.

original: na tathāgate kṣāntipāramitādharmatopalabhyate /🔽na vīryapāramitātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate kṣānti pāramitā dharma tā upalabhyate  na vīrya pāramitā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The true nature of the perfection of patience is not found in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not found in the suchness of the perfection of effort.

original: na tathāgate vīryapāramitātathatopalabhyate /🔽na vīryapāramitādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate vīrya pāramitā tathatā upalabhyate  na vīrya pāramitā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the perfection of effort is not found in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not found in the true nature of the perfection of effort.

original: na tathāgate vīryapāramitādharmatopalabhyate /🔽na dhyānapāramitātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate vīrya pāramitā dharma tā upalabhyate  na dhyāna pāramitā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The true nature of the perfection of effort is not found in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not found in the suchness of the perfection of concentration.

original: na tathāgate dhyānapāramitātathatopalabhyate /🔽na dhyānapāramitādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate dhyāna pāramitā tathatā upalabhyate  na dhyāna pāramitā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the perfection of concentration is not found in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not found in the true nature of the perfection of concentration.

original: na tathāgate dhyānapāramitādharmatopalabhyate /🔽na prajñāpāramitātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate dhyāna pāramitā dharma tā upalabhyate  na prajñāpāramitā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The true nature of the perfection of concentration is not found in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not found in the suchness of the perfection of wisdom.

original: na tathāgate prajñāpāramitātathatopalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate prajñāpāramitā tathatā upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the perfection of wisdom is not found in the Tathāgata.

original: na prajñāpāramitādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na prajñāpāramitā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the perfection of wisdom.

original: na tathāgate prajñāpāramitādharmatopalabhyate /🔽nādhyātmaśūnyatātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate prajñāpāramitā dharma tā upalabhyate  na adhyātma śūnyatā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the perfection of wisdom.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of internal emptiness.

original: na tathāgate 'dhyātmaśūnyatātathatopalabhyate /🔽nādhyātmaśūnyatādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate dhyātma śūnyatā tathatā upalabhyate  na adhyātma śūnyatā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of internal emptiness.

original: na tathāgate 'dhyātmaśūnyatādharmatopalabhyate /🔽na bahirdhaśūnyatātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate dhyātma śūnyatā dharmatā upalabhyate  na bahirdha śūnyatā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of external emptiness.

original: na tathāgate bahirdhāśūnyatātathatopalabhyate /🔽na bahirdhāśūnyatādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate bahirdhā śūnyatā tathatā upalabhyate  na bahirdhā śūnyatā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of external emptiness.

original: na tathāgate bahirdhāśūnyatādharmatopalabhyate /🔽nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate bahirdhā śūnyatā dharmatā upalabhyate  na adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of internal and external emptiness.

original: na tathāgate 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatātathatopalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate dhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā tathatā upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of internal and external emptiness.

original: na tathāgate 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatādharmatopalabhyate /🔽na śūnyatāśūnyatātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate dhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā dharmatā upalabhyate  na śūnyatā aśūnyatā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the reality-nature of the emptiness of internal and external.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the emptiness of emptiness.

original: na tathāgate śūnyatāśūnyatātathatopalabhyate /🔽na śūnyatāśūnyatādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate śūnyatā aśūnyatā tathatā upalabhyate  na śūnyatā aśūnyatā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is not apprehended in the emptiness of emptiness.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the reality-nature of the emptiness of emptiness.

original: na tathāgate śūnyatāśūnyatādharmatopalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate śūnyatā aśūnyatā dharmatā upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: na mahāśūnyatātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /🔽na tathāgate mahāśūnyatātathatopalabhyate /
analyzed: na mahā śūnyatā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate  na tathāgate mahā śūnyatā tathatā upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of great emptiness.🔽The suchness of the Tathāgata is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: na mahāśūnyatādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /🔽na tathāgate mahāśūnyatādharmatopalabhyate /🔽na paramārthaśūnyatātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na mahāśūnyatā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate  na tathāgate mahā śūnyatā dharmatā upalabhyate  na paramārtha śūnyatā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the reality-nature of great emptiness.🔽The suchness of the Tathāgata is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: na tathāgate paramārthaśūnyatātathatopalabhyate /🔽na paramarthaśūnyatādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate paramārtha śūnyatā tathatā upalabhyate  na paramartha śūnyatā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽The suchness of the Tathāgata is not apprehended in the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the reality-nature of the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: na tathāgate paramārthaśūnyatādharmatopalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate paramārtha śūnyatā dharmatā upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: na saṃskṛtaśūnyatātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na saṃskṛta śūnyatā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: na tathāgate saṃskṛtaśūnyatātathatopalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate saṃskṛta śūnyatā tathatā upalabhyate
translated: The thusness of the emptiness of the conditioned is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: na saṃskṛtaśūnyatādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /🔽na tathāgate saṃskṛtaśūnyatādharmatopalabhyate /🔽nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na saṃskṛta śūnyatā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate  na tathāgate saṃskṛta śūnyatā dharmatā upalabhyate  na asaṃskṛta śūnyatā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the nature of the emptiness of the conditioned.🔽The thusness of the emptiness of the conditioned is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: na tathāgate 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatātathatopalabhyate /🔽nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate saṃskṛta śūnyatā tathatā upalabhyate  na asaṃskṛta śūnyatā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the thusness of the emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽The thusness of the emptiness of the unconditioned is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: na tathāgate 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatādharmatopalabhyate /🔽nātyantaśūnyatātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate saṃskṛta śūnyatā dharmatā upalabhyate  na atyanta śūnyatā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the nature of the emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽The nature of the emptiness of the unconditioned is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: na tathāgate 'tyantaśūnyatātathatopalabhyate /🔽nātyantaśūnyatādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate tyanta śūnyatā tathatā upalabhyate  na atyanta śūnyatā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the thusness of the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽The thusness of the emptiness of the ultimate is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: na tathāgate 'tyantaśūnyatādharmatopalabhyate /🔽nānavarāgraśūnyatātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate tyanta śūnyatā dharmatā upalabhyate  na an avara agra śūnyatā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the nature of the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽The nature of the emptiness of the ultimate is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: na tathāgate 'navarāgraśūnyatātathatopalabhyate /🔽nānavarāgraśūnyatādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate navara agra śūnyatā tathatā upalabhyate 🔽na anavara agra śūnyatā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the thusness of the emptiness of the beginningless and endless.🔽The thusness of the emptiness of the beginningless and endless is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the nature of the emptiness of the beginningless and endless.

original: na tathāgate 'navarāgraśūnyatādharmatopalabhyate /🔽nānavakāraśūnyatātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate navara agra śūnyatā dharmatā upalabhyate  na anavakāra śūnyatā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the emptiness of non-rejection.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: na tathāgate 'navakāraśūnyatātathatopalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate navakāra śūnyatā tathatā upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: nānavakāraśūnyatādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /🔽na tathāgate 'navakāraśūnyatādharmatopalabhyate /🔽na prakṛtiśūnyatātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na anavakāra śūnyatā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate  na tathāgate navakāra śūnyatā dharmatā upalabhyate  na prakṛti śūnyatā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the emptiness of non-rejection.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: na tathāgate prakṛtiśūnyatātathatopalabhyate /🔽na prakṛtiśūnyatādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate prakṛti śūnyatā tathatā upalabhyate  na prakṛti śūnyatā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the emptiness of nature.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: na tathāgate prakṛtiśūnyatādharmatopalabhyate /🔽na sarvadharmaśūnyatātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate prakṛti śūnyatā dharmatā upalabhyate  na sarva dharma śūnyatā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the emptiness of nature.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: na tathāgate sarvadharmaśūnyatātathatopalabhyate /🔽na sarvadharmaśūnyatādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate sarva dharma śūnyatā tathatā upalabhyate  na sarva dharma śūnyatā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: na tathāgate sarvadharmaśūnyatādharmatopalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate sarva dharma śūnyatā dharmatā upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the emptiness of specific characteristics.

original: na tathāgate svalakṣaṇaśūnyatātathatopalabhyate /🔽na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatā tathatā upalabhyate  na sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of specific characteristics is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the emptiness of specific characteristics.

original: na tathāgate svalakṣaṇaśūnyatādharmatopalabhyate /🔽nāupalambhaśūnyatātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatā dharmatā upalabhyate  na aupalambha śūnyatā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of the emptiness of specific characteristics is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: na tathāgate 'nupalambhaśūnyatātathatopalabhyate /🔽nānupalambhaśūnyatādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate nu upalambha śūnyatā tathatā upalabhyate  na anupalambha śūnyatā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of non-apprehension is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: na tathāgate 'nupalambhaśūnyatādharmatopalabhyate /🔽nābhāvaśūnyatātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate na upalambha śūnyatā dharmatā upalabhyate  na abhāva śūnyatā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of the emptiness of non-apprehension is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the emptiness of own-nature.

original: na tathāgate 'bhāvaśūnyatātathatopalabhyate /🔽nābhāvaśūnyatādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate bhāva śūnyatā tathatā upalabhyate  na abhāva śūnyatā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of own-nature is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the emptiness of own-nature.

original: na tathāgate 'bhāvaśūnyatādharmatopalabhyate /🔽na svabhāvaśūnyatātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate bhāva śūnyatā dharmatā upalabhyate 🔽na svabhāva śūnyatā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of the emptiness of own-nature is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: na tathāgate svabhāvaśūnyatātathatopalabhyate /🔽na svabhāvaśūnyatādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate svabhāva śūnyatā tathatā upalabhyate  na svabhāva śūnyatā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the suchness of the emptiness of inherent nature.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: na tathāgate svabhāvaśūnyatādharmatopalabhyate /🔽nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate svabhāva śūnyatā dharmatā upalabhyate  na abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of inherent nature is not apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the suchness of the emptiness of the nature of non-existence.

original: na tathāgate 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatātathatopalabhyate /🔽nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate bhāva svabhāva śūnyatā tathatā upalabhyate  na abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of the nature of non-existence is not apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the emptiness of the nature of non-existence.

original: na tathāgate 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatādharmatopalabhyate /🔽na smṛtyupasthānatathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate bhāva svabhāva śūnyatā dharmatā upalabhyate  na smṛti upasthāna tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of the emptiness of the nature of non-existence is not apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the suchness of the applications of mindfulness.

original: na tathāgate smṛtyupasthānatathatopalabhyate /🔽na smṛtyupasthānadharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate smṛti upasthāna tathatā upalabhyate  na smṛti upasthāna dharma tāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the applications of mindfulness is not apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the applications of mindfulness.

original: na tathāgate smṛtyupasthānadharmatopalabhyate / na 🔽samyakprahāṇatathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate smṛti upasthāna dharma tā upalabhyate na  samyakprahāṇa tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of the applications of mindfulness is not apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the suchness of the right efforts.

original: na tathāgate samyakprahāṇatathatopalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate samyakprahāṇa tathatā upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the right efforts is not apprehended in the Thus-Gone One.

original: na samyakprahāṇadharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na samyakprahāṇa dharma tāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the reality of the right efforts.

original: na tathāgate samyakprahāṇadharmatopalabhyate /🔽narddhipādatathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate samyakprahāṇa dharma tā upalabhyate  na ṛddhipāda tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the reality of the right efforts.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the bases of spiritual power.

original: na tathāgata ṛddhipādatathatopalabhyate /🔽narddhipādadharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /🔽na tathāgata ṛddhipādadharmatopalabhyate /🔽nendriyatathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate ṛddhipāda tathatā upalabhyate  na ṛddhipāda dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate  na tathāgate ṛddhipāda dharmatā upalabhyate  na indriya tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the reality of the bases of spiritual power.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the reality of the Tathāgata.

original: na tathāgata indriyatathatopalabhyate /🔽nendriyadharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate indriya tathatā upalabhyate  na indriya dharma tāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the faculties.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: na tathāgata indriyadharmatopalabhyate /🔽na balatathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate indriya dharma tā upalabhyate  na bala tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the reality of the faculties.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the reality of the Tathāgata.

original: na tathāgate balatathatopalabhyate /🔽na bala dharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate bala tathatā upalabhyate  na bala dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the powers.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: na tathāgate baladharmatopalabhyate /🔽na bodhyaṅgatathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate bala dharmatā upalabhyate  na bodhyaṅga tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the reality of the powers.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the reality of the Tathāgata.

original: na tathāgate bodhyaṅgatathatopalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate bodhyaṅga tathatā upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the limbs of enlightenment.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: na bodhyaṅgadharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na bodhyaṅga dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the factors of awakening.

original: na tathāgate bodhyaṅgadharmatopalabhyate /🔽nāryāṣṭāṅgamārgatathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate bodhyaṅga dharma tā upalabhyate  na ārya aṣṭāṅga mārga tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: na tathāgata āryāṣṭāṅgamārgatathatopalabhyate /🔽nāryāṣṭāṅgamārgadharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate ārya aṣṭāṅga mārga tathatā upalabhyate  na ārya aṣṭāṅga mārga dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the noble eightfold path.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: na tathāgata āryāṣṭāṅgamārgadharmatopalabhyate /🔽nāryasatyatathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate ārya aṣṭāṅga mārga dharmatā upalabhyate  na ari asatya tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the noble eightfold path.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: na tathāgata āryasatyatathatopalabhyate /🔽nāryasatyadharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate ārya satya tathatā upalabhyate  na ari asatya dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the noble truths.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the noble truths.

original: na tathāgata āryasatyadharmatopalabhyate /🔽na dhyānatathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate ārya satya dharmatā upalabhyate  na dhyāna tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the concentrations.

original: na tathāgate dhyānatathatopalabhyate /🔽na dhyānadharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate dhyāna tathatā upalabhyate  na dhyāna dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the concentrations.

original: na tathāgate dhyānadharmatopalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate dhyāna dharma tā upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: nāpramāṇatathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na apramāṇa tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the immeasurables.

original: na tathāgate 'pramāṇatathatopalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate pramāṇa tathatā upalabhyate
translated: The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the suchness of the immeasurables.

original: nāpramāṇadharma tāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /🔽na tathāgate 'pramāṇadharmatopalabhyate /🔽nārūpyasamāpattitathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na a pramāṇa dharma tāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate  na tathāgate pramāṇa dharma tā upalabhyate  na ārūpya samāpatti tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the immeasurables' true nature.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the suchness of the Thus-Gone One.

original: na tathāgata ārūpyasamāpattitathatopalabhyate /🔽nārūpyasamāpattidharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate ārūpya samāpatti tathatā upalabhyate  na ārūpya samāpatti dharma tāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the suchness of the formless concentrations.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the formless concentrations' true nature.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the suchness of the formless concentrations.

original: na tathāgata ārūpyasamāpattidharmatopalabhyate /🔽na vimokṣatathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate ārūpya samāpatti dharma tā upalabhyate  na vimokṣa tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the formless concentrations' true nature.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the suchness of the liberations.

original: na tathāgate vimokṣatathatopalabhyate /🔽na vimokṣadharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate vimokṣa tathatā upalabhyate  na vimokṣa dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the liberations' true nature.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the suchness of the liberations.

original: na tathāgate vimokṣadharmatopalabhyate /🔽nānupūrvavihārasamāpattitathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /🔽na tathāgate 'nupūrvavihārasamāpattitathatopalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate vimokṣa dharmatā upalabhyate  na anupūrva vihāra samāpatti tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate  na tathāgate nupūrva vihāra samāpatti tathatā upalabhyate
translated: The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the liberations' true nature.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the suchness of the successive spheres of absorption.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the successive spheres of absorption's true nature.

original: nānupūrvavihārasamāpattidharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na anupūrva vihāra samāpatti dharma tāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Thus-Gone One is not apprehended in the suchness of the successive spheres of absorption.

original: na tathāgate 'nupūrvavihārasamāpattidharmatopalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate nupūrva vihāra samāpatti dharmatā upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the nature of the successive meditative absorptions.

original: na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhatathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /🔽na tathāgate śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhatathatopalabhyate /
analyzed: na śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukha tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate  na tathāgate śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukha tathatā upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the gateways to liberation that are emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.🔽The suchness of the Tathāgata is not apprehended in the gateways to liberation that are emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the gateways to liberation that are emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.🔽The suchness of the Tathāgata is not apprehended in the gateways to liberation that are emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhadharmatāyāṃ 🔽tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukha dharmatāyām  tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the nature of the gateways to liberation that are emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: na tathāgate śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhadharmatopalabhyate /🔽nābhijñātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukha dharmatā upalabhyate  na abhijñā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is not apprehended in the nature of the gateways to liberation that are emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the higher knowledges.

original: na tathāgate 'bhijñātathatopalabhyate /🔽nābhijñādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate bhijñā tathatā upalabhyate  na abhijñā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the nature of the higher knowledges.

original: na tathāgate 'bhijñādharmatopalabhyate /🔽na samādhitathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate bhijñā dharmatā upalabhyate  na samādhi tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The nature of the Tathāgata is not apprehended in the higher knowledges.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the meditative absorptions.

original: na tathāgate samādhitathatopalabhyate /🔽na samādhidharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate samādhi tathatā upalabhyate  na samādhi dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is not apprehended in the meditative absorptions.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the nature of the meditative absorptions.

original: na tathāgate samādhidharmatopalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate samādhi dharma tā upalabhyate
translated: The nature of the Tathāgata is not apprehended in the meditative absorptions.

original: na dhāraṇīmukhatathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na dhāraṇīmukha tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: na tathāgate dhāraṇīmukhatathatopalabhyate /🔽na dhāraṇīmukhadharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate dhāraṇīmukha tathatā upalabhyate  na dhāraṇīmukha dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the dhāraṇī gateways is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: na tathāgate dhāraṇīmukhadharmatopalabhyate /🔽na tathāgatabalatathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate dhāraṇīmukha dharmatā upalabhyate  na tathāgata bala tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of the dhāraṇī gateways is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the Tathāgata's powers.

original: na tathāgate tathāgatabalatathatopalabhyate /🔽na tathāgatabaladharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate tathāgata bala tathatā upalabhyate  na tathāgata bala dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata's powers is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the Tathāgata's powers.

original: na tathāgate tathāgatabaladharmatopalabhyate /🔽na vaiśāradyatathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate tathāgata bala dharmatā upalabhyate  na vaiśāradya tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of the Tathāgata's powers is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the grounds of self-confidence.

original: na tathāgate vaiśāradyatathatopalabhyate /🔽na vaiśāradyadharma tāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate vaiśāradya tathatā upalabhyate  na vaiśāradya dharma tāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the grounds of self-confidence is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the grounds of self-confidence.

original: na tathāgate vaiśāradyadharmatopalabhyate /🔽na pratisaṃvittathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate vaiśāradya dharmatā upalabhyate  na pratisaṃvid tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of the grounds of self-confidence is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the analytical knowledges.

original: na tathāgate pratisaṃvittathatopalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate pratisaṃvid tathatā upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the analytical knowledges is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: na pratisaṃviddharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na pratisaṃvid dharma tāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the analytical knowledges.

original: na tathāgate pratisaṃviddharmatopalabhyate /🔽na mahāmaitrītathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate pratisaṃvid dharma tā upalabhyate  na mahā maitrī tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The analytical knowledges are not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the great love.

original: na tathāgate mahāmaitrītathatopalabhyate /🔽na mahāmaitrī dharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate mahā maitrī tathatā upalabhyate  na mahā maitrī dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The great love is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the great love.

original: na tathāgate mahāmaitrīdharmatopalabhyate /🔽na mahākaruṇātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate mahā maitrī dharmatā upalabhyate  na mahā karuṇā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The great love is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the great compassion.

original: na tathāgate mahākaruṇātathatopalabhyate /🔽na mahākaruṇādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate mahā karuṇā tathatā upalabhyate  na mahā karuṇā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The great compassion is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the great compassion.

original: na tathāgate mahākaruṇādharmatopalabhyate /🔽nāveṇikabuddhadharmatathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate mahā karuṇā dharma tā upalabhyate  na āveṇika buddha dharma tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The great compassion is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the eighteen distinctive qualities of a buddha.

original: na tathāgata āveṇikabuddhadharmatathatopalabhyate /🔽nāveṇikabuddhadharmadharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate āveṇika buddha dharma tathatā upalabhyate  na āveṇika buddha dharma dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The eighteen distinctive qualities of a buddha are not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the eighteen distinctive qualities of a buddha.

original: na tathāgata āveṇikabuddhadharmadharmatopalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate āveṇika buddha dharma dharmatā upalabhyate
translated: The eighteen distinctive qualities of a buddha are not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: na sarvajñatātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na sarvajña tā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of omniscience.

original: na tathāgate sarvajñatātathatopalabhyate /🔽na sarvajñatādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate sarvajña tā tathatā upalabhyate  na sarvajña tā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of omniscience is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of omniscience.

original: na tathāgate sarvajñatādharmatopalabhyate /🔽na mārgākārajñatātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate sarvajña tā dharmatā upalabhyate  na mārga ākāra jña tā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of omniscience is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the knowledge of path aspects.

original: na tathāgate mārgākārajñatātathatopalabhyate /🔽na mārgākārajñatādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate mārga ākāra jña tā tathatā upalabhyate  na mārga ākāra jña tā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the knowledge of path aspects is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the knowledge of path aspects.

original: na tathāgate mārgākārajñatādharmatopalabhyate /🔽na sarvākārajñatātathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate mārga ākāra jña tā dharmatā upalabhyate  na sarva ākāra jña tā tathatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of the knowledge of path aspects is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: na tathāgate sarvākārajñatātathatopalabhyate /🔽na sarvākārajñatādharmatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate sarva ākāra jña tā tathatā upalabhyate  na sarva ākāra jña tā dharmatāyām tathāgataḥ upalabhyate
translated: The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the dharmatā of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: na tathāgate sarvākārajñatādharmatopalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathāgate sarva ākāra jña tā dharmatā upalabhyate
translated: The dharmatā of the knowledge of all aspects is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na rūpatathāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na rūpa tathāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: Kauśika, the Tathāgata is not conjoined with or disjoined from the suchness of form.

original: na rūpadharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na rūpa dharma tāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is not conjoined with or disjoined from the dharmatā of form.

original: nānyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra rūpa tathatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither bound nor freed from the suchness of form.

original: nānyatra rūpadharmatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra rūpa dharma tāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither bound nor freed from the true dharmic nature of form.

original: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na vedanātathāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na vedanā tathāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: Kauśika, the Tathāgata is neither bound nor freed from the suchness of feeling.

original: na vedanātathatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /🔽nānyatra vedanādharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na vedanā tathatāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ  na anyatra vedanā dharmatāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither bound nor freed from the suchness of feeling.🔽He is neither bound nor freed from the true dharmic nature of feeling.

original: nānyatra vedanādharmatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra vedanā dharmatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither bound nor freed from the true dharmic nature of feeling.

original: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na saṃjñātathāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na saṃjñā tathāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: Kauśika, the Tathāgata is neither bound nor freed from the suchness of perception.

original: na saṃjñādharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na saṃjñā dharma tāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither bound nor freed from the true dharmic nature of perception.

original: nānyatra saṃjñātathatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra saṃjñā tathatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither bound nor freed from the suchness of perception.

original: nānyatra saṃjñādharmatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra saṃjñā dharma tāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither bound nor freed from the true dharmic nature of perception.

original: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na saṃskāratathāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na saṃskāra tathāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: Kauśika, the Tathāgata is neither bound nor freed from the suchness of volitional formations.

original: na saṃskāradharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na saṃskāra dharma tāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither bound nor freed from the true dharmic nature of volitional formations.

original: nānyatra saṃskāratathatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra saṃskāra tathatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither joined nor disjoined from anything other than the suchness of volitional factors.

original: nānyatra saṃskāradharmatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra saṃskāra dharma tāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither joined nor disjoined from anything other than the true nature of the suchness of volitional factors.

original: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na vijñānatathāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /🔽na vijñānadharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /🔽nānyatra vijñānatathatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na vijñāna tathāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ  na vijñāna dharmatāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ  na anyatra vijñāna tathatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: Kauśika, the Tathāgata is neither joined nor disjoined from the suchness of consciousness.🔽He is neither joined nor disjoined from the true nature of the suchness of consciousness.🔽He is neither joined nor disjoined from anything other than the suchness of consciousness.

original: nānyatra vijñānadharmatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra vijñāna dharmatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither joined nor disjoined from anything other than the true nature of the suchness of consciousness.

original: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na cakṣustathāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na cakṣuḥ tathāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: Kauśika, the Tathāgata is neither joined nor disjoined from the suchness of the eyes.

original: na cakṣurdharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /🔽nānyatra cakṣustathatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ dharma tāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ  na anyatra cakṣuḥ tathatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither joined nor disjoined from the true nature of the suchness of the eyes.🔽He is neither joined nor disjoined from anything other than the suchness of the eyes.

original: nānyatra cakṣurdharmatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /🔽yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na śrotratathāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra cakṣuḥ dharmatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ  yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na śrotra tathāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither joined nor disjoined from anything other than the true nature of the suchness of the eyes.🔽Kauśika, the Tathāgata is neither joined nor disjoined from the suchness of the ears.

original: na śrotratathatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na śrotra tathatāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither joined nor disjoined from the suchness of the ears.

original: nānyatra śrotradharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra śrotra dharma tāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither bound nor freed from anything other than the dharmatā of the ear.

original: nānyatra śrotradharmatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra śrotra dharma tāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither bound nor freed from anything other than the dharmatā of the ear.

original: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na ghrāṇatathāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na ghrāṇa tathāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: Kauśika, the Tathāgata is neither bound nor freed from the suchness of the nose.

original: na ghrāṇadharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na ghrāṇa dharma tāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither bound nor freed from the dharmatā of the nose.

original: nānyatra ghrāṇatathatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra ghrāṇa tathatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither bound nor freed from anything other than the suchness of the nose.

original: nānyatra ghrāṇadharmatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra ghrāṇa dharma tāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither bound nor freed from anything other than the dharmatā of the nose.

original: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na jihvātathāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na jihvātathāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: Kauśika, the Tathāgata is neither bound nor freed from the suchness of the tongue.

original: na jihvādharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na jihvā dharma tāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither bound nor freed from the dharmatā of the tongue.

original: nānyatra jihvātathatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra jihvā tathatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither bound nor freed from anything other than the suchness of the tongue.

original: nānyatra jihvādharmatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra jihvā dharmatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither bound nor freed from anything other than the dharmatā of the tongue.

original: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na kāyatathāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na kāya tathāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: Kauśika, the Tathāgata is neither bound nor freed from the suchness of the body.

original: na kāyadharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /🔽nānyatra kāyatathatāyāḥ saṃyukto
analyzed: na kāya dharmatāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ  na anyatra kāya tathatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ

original: na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither bound nor freed from anything other than the suchness of the body.🔽He is neither bound nor freed from anything other than the dharmatā of the body.

original: nānyatra kāyadharmatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra kāya dharmatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither conjoined nor disjoined with anything other than the dharmatā of the body.

original: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na manastathāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na manastathāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ

translated: He is neither conjoined nor disjoined with anything other than the suchness of the mind.

original: nānyatra manodharmatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra manaḥ dharmatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither conjoined nor disjoined with anything other than the dharmatā of the mind.

original: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na rūpatathāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na rūpa tathāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: Kauśika, the Tathāgata is neither conjoined nor disjoined with the suchness of form.

original: na rūpadharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na rūpa dharma tāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither conjoined nor disjoined with the dharmatā of form.

original: nānyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra rūpa tathatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither conjoined nor disjoined with anything other than the suchness of form.

analyzed: na anyatra rūpa dharma tāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither conjoined nor disjoined with anything other than the dharmatā of form.

original: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na śabdatathāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /🔽na śabdatathatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /🔽nānyatra śabdadharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na śabda tathāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ  na śabda tathatāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ  na anyatra śabda dharma tāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: Kauśika, the Tathāgata is neither conjoined nor disjoined with the suchness of sound.🔽He is neither conjoined nor disjoined with the suchness of sound.🔽He is neither conjoined nor disjoined with anything other than the dharmatā of sound.

original: nānyatra śabdadharmatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra śabda dharma tāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ

analyzed: na anyatra gandha dharma tāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ

original: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /🔽na jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /🔽nānyatra jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /

translated: Kauśika, the Tathāgata is not bound or liberated in the suchness of tongue contact as a condition for feeling,🔽nor is he bound or liberated in the nature of tongue contact as a condition for feeling.🔽One is neither bound nor liberated in the suchness of tongue contact as a condition for feeling apart from the suchness of tongue contact as a condition for feeling,

original: nānyatra jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: nor is one bound or liberated in the nature of tongue contact as a condition for feeling apart from the nature of tongue contact as a condition for feeling.

original: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /🔽na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /🔽nānyatra kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ  na kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ  na anyatra kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: Kauśika, the Tathāgata is not bound or liberated in the suchness of body contact as a condition for feeling,🔽nor is he bound or liberated in the nature of body contact as a condition for feeling.🔽One is neither bound nor liberated in the suchness of body contact as a condition for feeling apart from the suchness of body contact as a condition for feeling,

original: nānyatra kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharmatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: nor is one bound or liberated in the nature of body contact as a condition for feeling apart from the nature of body contact as a condition for feeling.

original: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: Kauśika, the Tathāgata is not connected with the suchness of mind-contact as a condition for feeling, nor is he disconnected.

original: na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is not connected with the dharmatā of mind-contact as a condition for feeling, nor is he disconnected.

original: nānyatra manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is not connected with anything other than the suchness of mind-contact as a condition for feeling, nor is he disconnected.

original: nānyatra manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is not connected with anything other than the dharmatā of mind-contact as a condition for feeling, nor is he disconnected.

original: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na pṛthivīdhātutathāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na pṛthivī dhātu tathāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: Kauśika, the Tathāgata is not connected with the suchness of the earth element, nor is he disconnected.

analyzed: na pṛthivī dhātu dharma tāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ

translated: He is neither bound nor freed from what is other than the dharmatā of the fire element.

original: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa nārūpyasamāpattitathatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na ārūpya samāpatti tathatāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: Kauśika, the Tathāgata is neither conjoined nor disjoined from the suchness of the formless absorptions.

original: nārūpyasamāpattidharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na ārūpya samāpatti dharmatāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither conjoined nor disjoined from the true nature of the formless absorptions.

original: nānyatrārūpyasamāpattitathatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra ārūpya samāpatti tathatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither conjoined with nor disjoined from the suchness of the formless-world meditative absorption.

original: nānyatrārūpyasamāpattidharmatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra ārūpya samāpatti dharmatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: One is neither bound nor freed, and similarly, one is neither bound nor freed in the formless attainments, nor in the reality of the formless attainments, nor in the nature of the formless attainments, nor in anything other than the formless attainments, nor in anything other than the reality of the formless attainments, nor in anything other than the nature of the formless attainments.

original: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na vimokṣatathatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na vimokṣa tathatāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: Kauśika, the Tathāgata is not bound or freed in the reality of the liberations,

original: na vimokṣadharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /🔽nānyatra vimokṣatathatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na vimokṣa dharmatāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ  na anyatra vimokṣa tathatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: nor is he bound or freed in the nature of the liberations,🔽nor is he bound or freed in anything other than the reality of the liberations,

original: nānyatra vimokṣadharmatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra vimokṣa dharmatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: nor is he bound or freed in anything other than the nature of the liberations.

original: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa nānupūrvavihārasamāpattitathatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /🔽nānupūrvavihārasamāpattidharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /🔽nānyatrānupūrvavihārasamāpattitathatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na anupūrva vihāra samāpatti tathatāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ  na anupūrva vihāra samāpatti dharmatāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ  na anyatra anupūrva vihāra samāpatti tathatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: Kauśika, the Tathāgata is not bound or freed in the reality of the successive absorptions,🔽nor is he bound or freed in the nature of the successive absorptions,🔽nor is he bound or freed in anything other than the reality of the successive absorptions,

original: nānyatrānupūrvavihārasamāpattidharmatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra anupūrva vihāra samāpatti dharmatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: nor is he bound or freed in anything other than the nature of the successive absorptions.

original: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhatathatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukha tathatāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: Kauśika, the Tathāgata is not bound or liberated in the suchness of the liberation gate of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhadharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /🔽nānyatra śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhatathatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukha dharmatāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ  na anyatra śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukha tathatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is not bound or liberated in the true nature of the liberation gate of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.🔽He is not bound or liberated apart from the suchness of the liberation gate of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: nānyatra śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhadharmatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukha dharmatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is not bound or liberated apart from the true nature of the liberation gate of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa nābhijñātathatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /🔽nābhijñādharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /

original: nānyatrābhijñātathatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /🔽nānyatrābhijñādharmatāyāḥ
analyzed: na anyatra abhijñā tathatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ  na anyatra abhijñā dharma tāyāḥ
translated: He is not bound or liberated apart from the suchness of the higher knowledges.

original: saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is not bound or liberated apart from the true nature of the higher knowledges.

analyzed: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na samādhi tathatāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: Kauśika, the Tathāgata is not bound or liberated in the suchness of the concentrations.

analyzed: na samādhi dharmatāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ

original: na pratisaṃviddharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /🔽nānyatra pratisaṃvittathatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na pratisaṃvid dharma tāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ  na anyatra pratisaṃvid tathatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither bound nor freed from the nature of the analytical knowledges.🔽He is neither bound nor freed from anything other than the suchness of the analytical knowledges.

original: nānyatra pratisaṃviddharmatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra pratisaṃvid dharma tāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither bound nor freed from anything other than the nature of the analytical knowledges.

original: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na mahāmaitrītathatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /🔽na mahāmaitrīdharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /🔽nānyatra mahāmaitrītathatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na mahā maitrī tathatāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ  na mahā maitrī dharmatāyām saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ  na anyatra mahā maitrī tathatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: Kauśika, the Tathāgata is neither bound nor freed from the suchness of great love.🔽He is neither bound nor freed from the nature of great love.🔽He is neither bound nor freed from anything other than the suchness of great love.

original: nānyatra mahāmaitrīdharmatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na anyatra mahā maitrī dharmatāyāḥ saṃyuktaḥ na visaṃyuktaḥ
translated: He is neither bound nor freed from anything other than the nature of great love.

original: yaḥ kauśika tathāgataḥ sa na mahākaruṇātathatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ /
