analyzed: na cakṣuḥ dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra cakṣuḥ dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-nature of the eye is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-nature of the eye.

original: na śrotraṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śrotrāt prajñāpāramitā / na 🔽śrotratathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śrotratathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śrotram prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śrotrāt prajñāpāramitā na  śrotra tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śrotra tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The ear is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the ear.🔽The suchness of the ear is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the ear.

original: na śrotradharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śrotradharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śrotra dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śrotra dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-nature of the ear is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-nature of the ear.

original: na ghrāṇaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ghrāṇāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ghrāṇam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ghrāṇāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: The nose is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the nose.

original: na ghrāṇatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ghrāṇatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na ghrāṇadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ghrāṇadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na jihvā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jihvāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ghrāṇa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ghrāṇa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na ghrāṇa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ghrāṇa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na jihvā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jihvāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the nose is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the nose.🔽The dharma-nature of the nose is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-nature of the nose.🔽The tongue is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the tongue.

original: na jihvātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jihvātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na jihvā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jihvā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the tongue is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the tongue.

original: na jihvādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jihvādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na kāyaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kāyāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na jihvā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jihvā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na kāyaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kāyāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the tongue is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the tongue.🔽The body is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the body.

original: na kāyatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kāyatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na kāya tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kāya tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the body is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the body.

original: na kāyadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kāyadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na manaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra manasaḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na kāya dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kāya dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na manaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra manasaḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the body is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the body.🔽The mind is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the mind.

original: na manastathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra manastathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na manaḥ tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra manaḥ tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the mind is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the mind.

original: na manodharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra manodharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na rūpaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra rūpāt prajñāpāramitā /🔽na rūpatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na manaḥ dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra manaḥ dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na rūpam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra rūpāt prajñāpāramitā  na rūpa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra rūpa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the mind is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the mind.🔽Form is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than form.🔽The suchness of form is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of form.

original: na rūpadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra rūpadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na rūpa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra rūpa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of form is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of form.

original: na śabdaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śabdāt prajñāpāramitā /🔽na śabdatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śabdatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śabdaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śabdāt prajñāpāramitā  na śabda tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śabda tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: Sound is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than sound.🔽The suchness of sound is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of sound.

original: na śabdadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śabdadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śabda dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śabda dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The true nature of sound is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the true nature of sound.

original: na gandhaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra gandhāt prajñāpāramitā /🔽na gandhatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra gandhatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na gandhaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra gandhāt prajñāpāramitā  na gandha tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra gandha tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: Smell is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than smell.🔽The suchness of smell is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of smell.

original: na gandhadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra gandhadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na gandha dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra gandha dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The true nature of smell is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the true nature of smell.

original: na rasaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra rasāt prajñāpāramitā /🔽na rasatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra rasatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na rasaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra rasāt prajñāpāramitā  na rasa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra rasa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: Taste is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than taste.🔽The suchness of taste is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of taste.

original: na rasadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra rasadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na rasa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra rasa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The true nature of taste is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the true nature of taste.

original: na sparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sparśāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na sparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sparśāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: Touch is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than touch.

original: na sparśatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sparśatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na sparśadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sparśadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na sparśa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sparśa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na sparśa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sparśa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of contact.🔽The dharma-constituent of contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of contact.

original: na dharmāḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra dharmebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na dharmatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra dharmatathatāyaḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na dharmāḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra dharmebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā  na dharma tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra dharma tathatā ayaḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of contact.🔽The dharma-constituent of contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of contact.

original: na dharmadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra dharmadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na dharma dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra dharma dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of contact.

original: na cakṣurvijñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra cakṣurvijñānāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ vijñānam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra cakṣuḥ vijñānāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: Eye consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than eye consciousness.🔽The suchness of eye consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of eye consciousness.

original: na cakṣurvijñānatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra cakṣurvijñānatathatāyāḥ 🔽prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ vijñāna tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra cakṣuḥ vijñāna tathatāyāḥ  prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of eye consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of eye consciousness.

original: na cakṣurvijñānadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra cakṣurvijñānadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ vijñāna dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra cakṣuḥ vijñāna dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of eye consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of eye consciousness.

original: na śrotravijñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śrotravijñānāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śrotra vijñānam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śrotra vijñānāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: Ear consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than ear consciousness.

original: na śrotravijñānatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śrotravijñānatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śrotra vijñāna tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śrotra vijñāna tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of ear consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of ear consciousness.

original: na śrotravijñānadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śrotravijñānadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na ghrāṇavijñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ghrāṇavijñānāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śrotra vijñāna dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śrotra vijñāna dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na ghrāṇa vijñānam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ghrāṇa vijñānāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of ear consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of ear consciousness.🔽Nose consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than nose consciousness.

original: na ghrāṇavijñānatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ghrāṇavijñānatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ghrāṇa vijñāna tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ghrāṇa vijñāna tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of nose consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of nose consciousness.

original: na ghrāṇavijñānadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ghrāṇavijñānadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na jihvāvijñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jihvāvijñānāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ghrāṇa vijñāna dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ghrāṇa vijñāna dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na jihvā vijñānam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jihvā vijñānāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of nose consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of nose consciousness.🔽Tongue consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than tongue consciousness.

original: na jihvāvijñānatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jihvāvijñānatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na jihvā vijñāna tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jihvā vijñāna tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of tongue consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of tongue consciousness.

original: na jihvāvijñānadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jihvāvijñānadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na jihvā vijñāna dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jihvā vijñāna dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of tongue consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of tongue consciousness.

original: na kāyavijñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kāyavijñānāt prajñāpāramitā /🔽na kāyavijñānatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kāyavijñānatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na kāya vijñānam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kāya vijñānāt prajñāpāramitā  na kāya vijñāna tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kāya vijñāna tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The wisdom pāramitā is not body consciousness, nor is it other than body consciousness.🔽The wisdom pāramitā is not the suchness of body consciousness, nor is it other than the suchness of body consciousness.

original: na kāyavijñānadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kāyavijñānadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na manovijñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra manovijñānāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na kāya vijñāna dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kāya vijñāna dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na manaḥ vijñānam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra manaḥ vijñānāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: The wisdom pāramitā is not the dharmatā of body consciousness, nor is it other than the dharmatā of body consciousness.🔽The wisdom pāramitā is not mind consciousness, nor is it other than mind consciousness.

original: na manovijñānatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra manovijñānatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na manaḥ vijñāna tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra manaḥ vijñāna tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The wisdom pāramitā is not the suchness of mind consciousness, nor is it other than the suchness of mind consciousness.

original: na manovijñānadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra manovijñānadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra cakṣuḥsaṃsparśāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na manaḥ vijñāna dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra manaḥ vijñāna dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na cakṣuḥ saṃsparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra cakṣuḥ saṃsparśāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: The wisdom pāramitā is not the dharmatā of mind consciousness, nor is it other than the dharmatā of mind consciousness.🔽The wisdom pāramitā is not eye contact, nor is it other than eye contact.

original: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra cakṣuḥsaṃsparśatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The wisdom pāramitā is not the suchness of eye contact, nor is it other than the suchness of eye contact.

original: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra cakṣuḥsaṃsparśadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śrotrasaṃsparśāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na śrotra saṃsparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śrotra saṃsparśāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of eye contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the dharmatā of eye contact.🔽Ear contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than ear contact.

original: na śrotrasaṃsparśatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śrotrasaṃsparśatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śrotra saṃsparśa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śrotra saṃsparśa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of ear contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the suchness of ear contact.

original: na śrotrasaṃsparśadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śrotrasaṃsparśadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śrotra saṃsparśa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śrotra saṃsparśa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of ear contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the dharmatā of ear contact.

original: na ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ghrāṇasaṃsparśāt prajñāpāramitā /🔽na ghrāṇasaṃsparśatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ghrāṇasaṃsparśatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na ghrāṇasaṃsparśadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ghrāṇasaṃsparśadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ghrāṇa saṃsparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ghrāṇa saṃsparśāt prajñāpāramitā  na ghrāṇa saṃsparśa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ghrāṇa saṃsparśa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na ghrāṇa saṃsparśa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ghrāṇa saṃsparśa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: Nose contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than nose contact.🔽The suchness of nose contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the suchness of nose contact.🔽The dharmatā of nose contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the dharmatā of nose contact.

original: na jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jihvāsaṃsparśāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na jihvā saṃsparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jihvā saṃsparśāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: Tongue contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than tongue contact.

original: na jihvāsaṃsparśatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jihvāsaṃsparśatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
analyzed: na jihvā saṃsparśa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jihvā saṃsparśa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of tongue contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of tongue contact.

original: na jihvāsaṃsparśadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jihvāsaṃsparśadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na jihvā saṃsparśa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jihvā saṃsparśa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The true dharmic nature of tongue contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the true dharmic nature of tongue contact.

original: na kāyasaṃsparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kāyasaṃsparśāt prajñāpāramitā /🔽na kāyasaṃsparśatathatā prajñāpāramitā nanyatra kāyasaṃsparśatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na kāya saṃsparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kāya saṃsparśāt prajñāpāramitā  na kāya saṃsparśa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kāya saṃsparśa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: Body contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than body contact.🔽The suchness of body contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of body contact.

original: na kāyasaṃsparśadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kāyasaṃsparśadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra manaḥsaṃsparśāt prajñāpāramitā /🔽na manaḥsaṃsparśatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra manaḥsaṃsparśatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na kāya saṃsparśa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kāya saṃsparśa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na manaḥ saṃsparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra manaḥ saṃsparśāt prajñāpāramitā  na manaḥ saṃsparśa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra manaḥ saṃsparśa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The true dharmic nature of body contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the true dharmic nature of body contact.🔽Mind contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than mind contact.🔽The suchness of mind contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of mind contact.

original: na manaḥsaṃsparśadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra manaḥsaṃsparśadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na manaḥ saṃsparśa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra manaḥ saṃsparśa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The true dharmic nature of mind contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the true dharmic nature of mind contact.

original: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The eye-contact-conditioned feeling is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the eye-contact-conditioned feeling.🔽The suchness of the eye-contact-conditioned feeling is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the eye-contact-conditioned feeling.

original: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na śrotra saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śrotra saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of the eye-contact-conditioned feeling is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of the eye-contact-conditioned feeling.🔽The ear-contact-conditioned feeling is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the ear-contact-conditioned feeling.

original: na śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śrotra saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śrotra saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the ear-contact-conditioned feeling is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the ear-contact-conditioned feeling.

original: na śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śrotra saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śrotra saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of the ear-contact-conditioned feeling is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of the ear-contact-conditioned feeling.

original: na ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ghrāṇa saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ghrāṇa saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The nose-consciousness element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the nose-consciousness element.

original: na ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ghrāṇa saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ghrāṇa saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na ghrāṇa saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ghrāṇa saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the nose-consciousness element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the suchness of the nose-consciousness element.🔽The true nature of the nose-consciousness element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the true nature of the nose-consciousness element.🔽The tongue-consciousness element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the tongue-consciousness element.🔽The suchness of the tongue-consciousness element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the suchness of the tongue-consciousness element.

original: na jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The true nature of the tongue-consciousness element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the true nature of the tongue-consciousness element.

original: na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The feeling that arises from contact with the body is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the feeling that arises from contact with the body.

original: na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the feeling that arises from contact with the body is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the feeling that arises from contact with the body.

original: na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatā
analyzed: na kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tā
translated: The dharma-constituent of the feeling that arises from contact with the body

original: prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of the feeling that arises from contact with the body.🔽The feeling that arises from contact with the mind is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the feeling that arises from contact with the mind.🔽The suchness of the feeling that arises from contact with the mind is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the feeling that arises from contact with the mind.

original: na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of the feeling that arises from contact with the mind is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of the feeling that arises from contact with the mind.

original: na pṛthivīdhātuḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra pṛthivīdhātoḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na pṛthivī dhātuḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra pṛthivī dhātoḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The earth element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the earth element.

original: na pṛthivīdhātutathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra pṛthivīdhātutathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na pṛthivī dhātu tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra pṛthivī dhātu tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the earth element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the earth element.

original: na pṛthivīdhātudharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra pṛthivīdhātudharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na pṛthivī dhātu dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra pṛthivī dhātu dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-nature of the earth element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-nature of the earth element.

original: nābdhātuḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatrābdhātoḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ap dhātuḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ap dhātoḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The water element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the water element.

original: nābdhātutathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrābdhātutathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ap dhātu tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ap dhātu tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the water element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the water element.

original: nābdhātudharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrābdhātudharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ap dhātu dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ap dhātu dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-nature of the water element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-nature of the water element.

original: na tejodhātuḥ prajñāpāramitā nanyatra tejodhātoḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na tejaḥ dhātuḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra tejaḥ dhātoḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The fire element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the fire element.

original: na tejodhātutathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra tejodhātutathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na tejaḥ dhātu tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra tejaḥ dhātu tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the fire element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the fire element.

original: na tejodhātudharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra tejodhātudharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na tejaḥ dhātu dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra tejaḥ dhātu dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-nature of the fire element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-nature of the fire element.

original: na vārudhātuḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vāyudhātoḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na vāyudhātutathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vāyudhātutathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vārudhātuḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vāyudhātoḥ prajñāpāramitā  na vāyu dhātu tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vāyu dhātu tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The wind element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the wind element.🔽The suchness of the wind element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the wind element.

original: na vāyudhātudharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra pṛthivīdhātudharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vāyu dhātu dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra pṛthivī dhātu dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of the wind element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of the wind element.

original: nākāśadhātuḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatrākāśadhātoḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ākāśa dhātuḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ākāśa dhātoḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: Space is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than space.

original: nākāśadhātutathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrākāśadhātutathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ākāśa dhātu tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ākāśa dhātu tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of space is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of space.

original: nākāśadhātudharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrākāśavīdhātudharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ākāśa dhātu dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ākāśa vī dhātu dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of space is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of space.

original: na vijñānadhātuḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vijñānadhātoḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vijñāna dhātuḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vijñāna dhātoḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: Consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than consciousness.

original: na vijñānadhātutathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vijñānadhātutathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vijñāna dhātu tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vijñāna dhātu tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of consciousness.

original: na vijñānadhātudharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vijñānadhātudharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vijñāna dhātu dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vijñāna dhātu dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of consciousness.

original: nāvidyā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrāvidyāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽nāvidyātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrāvidyātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na avidyā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra avidyāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na avidyā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra avidyā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: Ignorance is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than ignorance.🔽The suchness of ignorance is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of ignorance.

original: nāvidyādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrāvidyādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na avidyā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra avidyā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of ignorance is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of ignorance.

original: na saṃskārāḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra saṃskārebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na saṃskāratathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra saṃskāratathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na saṃskārāḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra saṃskārebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā  na saṃskāra tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra saṃskāra tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: Formations are not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than formations.🔽The suchness of formations is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of formations.

original: na saṃskāradharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra saṃskāradharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na saṃskāra dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra saṃskāra dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of formations is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of formations.

original: na vijñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vijñānāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vijñānam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vijñānāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: Consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than consciousness.

original: na vijñānatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vijñānatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vijñāna tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vijñāna tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of consciousness.

original: na vijñānadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vijñānadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vijñāna dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vijñāna dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of consciousness.

original: na nāmarūpaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra nāmarūpāt prajñāpāramitā /🔽na nāmarūpatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra nāmarūpatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na nāma rūpam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra nāma rūpāt prajñāpāramitā  na nāma rūpa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra nāma rūpa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: Form is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than form.🔽The suchness of form is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of form.

original: na nāmarūpadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra nāmarūpadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na ṣaḍāyatanaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ṣaḍāyatanāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na nāma rūpa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra nāma rūpa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na ṣaṣ āyatanam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ṣaṣ āyatanāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of form is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of form.🔽The six sense fields are not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the six sense fields.

original: na ṣaḍāyatanatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ṣaḍāyatanatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ṣaṣ āyatana tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ṣaṣ āyatana tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the six sense fields is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the six sense fields.

original: na ṣaḍāyatanadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ṣaḍāyatanadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ṣaṣ āyatana dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ṣaṣ āyatana dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of the six sense fields is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of the six sense fields.

original: na sparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sparśāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na sparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sparśāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: Contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than contact.

original: na sparśatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sparśatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na sparśa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sparśa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of contact.

original: na sparśadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sparśadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na sparśa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sparśa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of contact.

original: na vedanā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na vedanātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vedanātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vedanā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na vedanā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vedanā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: Feeling is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than feeling.🔽The suchness of feeling is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the suchness of feeling.

original: na vedanādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vedanādharmatāyāṇ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na tṛṣṇā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra tṛṣṇāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vedanā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vedanā dharma tāyāṇ prajñāpāramitā  na tṛṣṇā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra tṛṣṇāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of feeling is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the dharma-constituent of feeling.🔽Craving is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than craving.

original: na tṛṣṇātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra tṛṣṇātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na tṛṣṇā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra tṛṣṇā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of craving is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the suchness of craving.

original: na tṛṣṇādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra tṛṣṇādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽nopādānaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra opādānāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na tṛṣṇā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra tṛṣṇā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na upādānam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ā upādānāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of craving is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the dharma-constituent of craving.🔽Clinging is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than clinging.

original: nopādānatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatropādānatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na upādāna tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra upādāna tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of clinging is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the suchness of clinging.

original: nopādānadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatropādānadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na upādāna dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra upādāna dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of clinging is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the dharma-constituent of clinging.

original: na bhavaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra bhavāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na bhavaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra bhavāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: Becoming is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than becoming.

original: na bhavatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra bhavatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na bhava tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra bhava tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of becoming is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of becoming.

original: na bhavadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra bhavadharmatāyāṇ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na jātiḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jāteḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na bhava dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra bhava dharma tāyāṇ prajñāpāramitā  na jātiḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jāteḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmic nature of becoming is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmic nature of becoming.🔽Birth is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than birth.

original: na jātitathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jātitathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na jāti tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jāti tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of birth is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of birth.

original: na jātidharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jātidharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na jarāmaraṇaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jarāmaraṇāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na jāti dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jāti dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na jarā maraṇam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jarā maraṇāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmic nature of birth is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmic nature of birth.🔽Old age and death are not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than old age and death.

original: na jarāmaraṇatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jarāmaraṇatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na jarā maraṇa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jarā maraṇa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of old age and death is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of old age and death.

original: na jarāmaraṇadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jarāmaraṇadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na jarā maraṇa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jarā maraṇa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmic nature of old age and death is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmic nature of old age and death.

original: na dānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra dānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na dāna pāramitā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra dāna pāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The perfection of giving is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the perfection of giving.

original: na dānapāramitātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra dānapāramitātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na dāna pāramitā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra dāna pāramitā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the perfection of generosity is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the suchness of the perfection of generosity.

original: na dānapāramitādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra dānapāramitādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na dāna pāramitā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra dāna pāramitā dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The true nature of the perfection of generosity is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the true nature of the perfection of generosity.

original: na śīlapāramitā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śīlapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na śīlapāramitātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śīlapāramitātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śīla pāramitā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śīla pāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na śīla pāramitā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śīla pāramitā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The perfection of morality is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the perfection of morality.🔽The suchness of the perfection of morality is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the suchness of the perfection of morality.

original: na śīlapāramitādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śīlapāramitādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śīla pāramitā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śīla pāramitā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The true nature of the perfection of morality is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the true nature of the perfection of morality.

original: na kṣāntipāramitā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kṣāntipāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na kṣāntipāramitātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kṣāntipāramitātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na kṣānti pāramitā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kṣānti pāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na kṣānti pāramitā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kṣānti pāramitā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The perfection of patience is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the perfection of patience.🔽The suchness of the perfection of patience is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the suchness of the perfection of patience.

original: na kṣāntipāramitādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kṣāntipāramitādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na kṣānti pāramitā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kṣānti pāramitā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The true nature of the perfection of patience is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the true nature of the perfection of patience.

original: na vīryapāramitā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vīryapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na vīryapāramitātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vīryapāramitātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vīrya pāramitā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vīrya pāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na vīrya pāramitā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vīrya pāramitā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The perfection of perseverance is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the perfection of perseverance.🔽The suchness of the perfection of perseverance is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the suchness of the perfection of perseverance.

original: na vīryapāramitādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vīryapāramitādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vīrya pāramitā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vīrya pāramitā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The true nature of the perfection of perseverance is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the true nature of the perfection of perseverance.

original: na dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na dhyānapāramitātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra dhyānapāramitātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na dhyāna pāramitā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra dhyāna pāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na dhyāna pāramitā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra dhyāna pāramitā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The perfection of concentration is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the perfection of concentration.🔽The suchness of the perfection of concentration is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the suchness of the perfection of concentration.

original: na dhyānapāramitādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra dhyānapāramitādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na dhyāna pāramitā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra dhyāna pāramitā dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The true nature of the perfection of concentration is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the true nature of the perfection of concentration.🔽The perfection of wisdom is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the perfection of wisdom.

original: na prajñāpāramitātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra prajñāpāramitātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na prajñāpāramitā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra prajñāpāramitā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the perfection of wisdom is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the suchness of the perfection of wisdom.

original: na prajñāpāramitādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra prajñāpāramitādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na prajñāpāramitā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra prajñāpāramitā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not the dharmatā of the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the dharmatā of the perfection of wisdom.

original: nādhyātmaśūnyatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrādhyātmaśūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na adhyātma śūnyatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra adhyātma śūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not internal emptiness, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than internal emptiness.

original: nādhyātmaśūnyatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrādhyātmaśūnyatātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na adhyātma śūnyatā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra adhyātma śūnyatā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not the suchness of internal emptiness, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the suchness of internal emptiness.

original: nādhyātmaśūnyatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrādhyātmaśūnyatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na adhyātma śūnyatā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra adhyātma śūnyatā dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not the dharmatā of internal emptiness, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the dharmatā of internal emptiness.

original: na bahirdhāśūnyatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra bahirdhāśūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na bahirdhā śūnyatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra bahirdhā śūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not external emptiness, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than external emptiness.

original: na bahirdhāśūnyatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra bahirdhāśūnyatātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na bahirdhā śūnyatā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra bahirdhā śūnyatā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not the suchness of external emptiness, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the suchness of external emptiness.

original: na bahirdhāśūnyatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra bahirdhāśūnyatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na bahirdhā śūnyatā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra bahirdhā śūnyatā dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not the dharmatā of external emptiness, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the dharmatā of external emptiness.

original: nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not internal and external emptiness, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than internal and external emptiness.

original: nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of internal and external emptiness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of internal and external emptiness.

original: nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatādharmatāyāḥ 🔽prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā dharmatāyāḥ  prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of internal and external emptiness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of internal and external emptiness.

original: na śūnyatāsūnyatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śūnyatāśūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śūnyatā sūnyatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śūnyatā aśūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of emptiness of emptiness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of emptiness of emptiness.🔽The dharmatā of emptiness of emptiness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of emptiness of emptiness.

original: na śūnyatāśūnyatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śūnyatāśūnyatātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śūnyatā a śūnyatā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śūnyatā a śūnyatā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of emptiness of emptiness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of emptiness of emptiness.

original: na śūnyatāśūnyatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śūnyatāśūnyatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na mahāśūnyatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra mahāśūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śūnyatā aśūnyatā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śūnyatā aśūnyatā dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na mahā śūnyatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra mahā śūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of emptiness of emptiness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of emptiness of emptiness.🔽Great emptiness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than great emptiness.

original: na mahāśūnyatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra mahāśūnyatātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na mahā śūnyatā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra mahā śūnyatā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of great emptiness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of great emptiness.

original: na mahāśūnyatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra mahāśūnyatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na paramārthaśūnyatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra paramārthaśūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na mahā śūnyatā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra mahā śūnyatā dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na paramārtha śūnyatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra paramārtha śūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the great emptiness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anywhere else apart from the dharmatā of the great emptiness.🔽The ultimate emptiness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anywhere else apart from the ultimate emptiness.

original: na paramārthaśūnyatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra paramārthaśūnyatātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na paramārtha śūnyatā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra paramārtha śūnyatā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the ultimate emptiness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anywhere else apart from the suchness of the ultimate emptiness.

original: na paramārthaśūnyatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra paramārthaśūnyatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na saṃskṛtaśūnyatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na paramārtha śūnyatā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra paramārtha śūnyatā dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na saṃskṛta śūnyatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra saṃskṛta śūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the ultimate emptiness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anywhere else apart from the dharmatā of the ultimate emptiness.🔽The emptiness of conditioned phenomena is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anywhere else apart from the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: na saṃskṛtaśūnyatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra saṃskṛtaśūnyatātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na saṃskṛta śūnyatā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra saṃskṛta śūnyatā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anywhere else apart from the suchness of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: na saṃskṛtaśūnyatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra saṃskṛtaśūnyatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na saṃskṛta śūnyatā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra saṃskṛta śūnyatā dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anywhere else apart from the dharmatā of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na asaṃskṛta śūnyatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra asaṃskṛta śūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na asaṃskṛta śūnyatā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra asaṃskṛta śūnyatā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of the unconditioned is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na asaṃskṛta śūnyatā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra asaṃskṛta śūnyatā dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmic nature of the emptiness of the unconditioned is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmic nature of the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: nātyantaśūnyatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrātyantaśūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na atyanta śūnyatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra atyanta śūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The emptiness of the ultimate is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: nātyantaśūnyatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrātyantaśūnyatātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na atyanta śūnyatā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra atyanta śūnyatā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of the ultimate is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: nātyantaśūnyatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrātyantaśūnyatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽nānavarāgraśūnyatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrānavarāgraśūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na atyanta śūnyatā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra atyanta śūnyatā dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na anavara agra śūnyatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra anavara agra śūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmic nature of the emptiness of the ultimate is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmic nature of the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽The emptiness of the beginningless and endless is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the emptiness of the beginningless and endless.

original: nānavarāgraśūnyatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrānavarāgraśūnyatātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na anavara agra śūnyatā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra anavara agra śūnyatā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of the beginningless and endless is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the emptiness of the beginningless and endless.

original: nānavarāgraśūnyatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrānavarāgraśūnyatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na anavara agra śūnyatā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra anavara agra śūnyatā dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the emptiness of non-rejection is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: nānavakāraśūnyatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrānavakāraśūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na anavakāra śūnyatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra anavakāra śūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The emptiness of non-rejection is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: nānavakāraśūnyatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrānavakāraśūnyatātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽nānavakāraśūnyatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrānavakāraśūnyatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na anavakāra śūnyatā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra anavakāra śūnyatā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na anavakāra śūnyatā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra anavakāra śūnyatā dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of non-rejection is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the emptiness of non-rejection.🔽The dharmatā of the emptiness of non-rejection is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: na prakṛtiśūnyatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra prakṛtiśūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na prakṛti śūnyatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra prakṛti śūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The emptiness of inherent nature is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: na prakṛtiśūnyatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra prakṛtiśūnyatātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na prakṛti śūnyatā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra prakṛti śūnyatā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of inherent nature is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: na prakṛtiśūnyatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra prakṛtiśūnyatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na prakṛti śūnyatā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra prakṛti śūnyatā dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the emptiness of inherent nature is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: na sarvadharmaśūnyatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na sarva dharma śūnyatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sarva dharma śūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: na sarvadharmaśūnyatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sarvadharmaśūnyatātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na sarva dharma śūnyatā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sarva dharma śūnyatā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of all phenomena is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: na sarvadharmaśūnyatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sarvadharmaśūnyatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na sarva dharma śūnyatā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sarva dharma śūnyatā dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the emptiness of all phenomena is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The emptiness of its own characteristics is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the emptiness of its own characteristics.

original: na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra svalakṣaṇaśūnyatātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of its own characteristics is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the emptiness of its own characteristics.

original: na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra svalakṣaṇaśūnyatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽nānupalambhaśūnyatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrānupalambhaśūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatā dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na anupalambha śūnyatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra anupalambha śūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the emptiness of its own characteristics is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the emptiness of its own characteristics.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: nānupalambhaśūnyatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrānupalambhaśūnyatātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na anupalambha śūnyatā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra anupalambha śūnyatā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of non-apprehension is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: nānupalambhaśūnyatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrānupalambhaśūnyatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na anupalambha śūnyatā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra anupalambha śūnyatā dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the emptiness of non-apprehension is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: nābhāvaśūnyatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrābhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na abhāva śūnyatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra abhāva śūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The emptiness of non-existence is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the emptiness of non-existence.

original: nābhāvaśūnyatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrābhāvaśūnyatātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na abhāva śūnyatā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra abhāva śūnyatā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of non-existence is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the emptiness of non-existence.

original: nābhāvaśūnyatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrābhāvaśūnyatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na abhāva śūnyatā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra abhāva śūnyatā dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the emptiness of non-existence is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the emptiness of non-existence.

original: na svabhāvaśūnyatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra svabhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na svabhāva śūnyatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra svabhāva śūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The emptiness of own-nature is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the emptiness of own-nature.

original: na svabhāvaśūnyatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra svabhāvaśūnyatātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na svabhāva śūnyatā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra svabhāva śūnyatā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of own-nature is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the emptiness of own-nature.

original: na svabhāvaśūnyatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra svabhāvaśūnyatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na svabhāva śūnyatā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra svabhāva śūnyatā dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the emptiness of own-nature is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the emptiness of own-nature.

original: nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra abhāva svabhāva śūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The emptiness of the own-nature of non-existence is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the emptiness of the own-nature of non-existence.

original: nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of the nature of non-existence is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the emptiness of the nature of non-existence.

original: nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the emptiness of the nature of non-existence is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the emptiness of the nature of non-existence.

original: na smṛtyupasthānāni prajñāpāramitā nānyatra smṛtyupasthānebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na smṛti upasthānāni prajñāpāramitā na anyatra smṛti upasthānebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The applications of mindfulness are not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the applications of mindfulness.

original: na smṛtyupasthānatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra smṛtyupasthānatathatāyāḥ 🔽prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na smṛti upasthāna tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra smṛti upasthāna tathatāyāḥ  prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the applications of mindfulness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the applications of mindfulness.

original: na smṛtyupasthānadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra smṛtyupasthānadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na samyakprahāṇāni prajñāpāramitā nānyatra samyakprahāṇebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na smṛti upasthāna dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra smṛti upasthāna dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na samyak prahāṇāni prajñāpāramitā na anyatra samyak prahāṇebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the applications of mindfulness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the applications of mindfulness.🔽The right efforts are not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the right efforts.

original: na samyakprahāṇatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra samyakprahāṇatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na samyak prahāṇa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra samyak prahāṇa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the right efforts is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the right efforts.

original: na samyakprahāṇadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra samyakprahāṇadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽narddhipādāḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatrarddhipādebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na samyak prahāṇa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra samyak prahāṇa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na ṛddhipādāḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ṛddhipādebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the correct exertions is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the correct exertions.🔽The bases of supernatural power are not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the bases of supernatural power.

original: narddhipādatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrarddhipādatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ṛddhipāda tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ṛddhipāda tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the bases of supernatural power is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the bases of supernatural power.

original: narddhipādadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrarddhipādaharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ṛddhipāda dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ṛddhipāda harma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the bases of supernatural power is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the bases of supernatural power.

original: nendriyāṇi prajñāpāramitā nānyatrendriyebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na indriyāṇi prajñāpāramitā na anyatra indriyebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The faculties are not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the faculties.

original: nendriyatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrendriyatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na indriya tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra indriya tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the faculties is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the faculties.

original: nendriyadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrendriyadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na balāni prajñāpāramitā nānyatra balebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na indriya dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra indriya dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na balāni prajñāpāramitā na anyatra balebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the faculties is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the faculties.🔽The powers are not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the powers.

original: na balatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra balatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na bala tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra bala tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the powers is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the powers.

original: na baladharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra baladharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na bala dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra bala dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the powers is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the powers.

original: na bodhyaṅgāni prajñāpāramitā nānyatra bodhyaṅgebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na bodhyaṅgāni prajñāpāramitā na anyatra bodhyaṅgebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The limbs of enlightenment are not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the limbs of enlightenment.

original: na bodhyaṅgatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra bodhyaṅgatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na bodhyaṅga tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra bodhyaṅga tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the limbs of enlightenment is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the limbs of enlightenment.

original: na bodhyaṅgadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra bodhyaṅgadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na bodhyaṅga dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra bodhyaṅga dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the limbs of enlightenment is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the limbs of enlightenment.

original: nāryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatrāryāṣṭāṅgamārgāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ārya aṣṭāṅga mārgaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ārya aṣṭāṅga mārgāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: The noble eightfold path is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the noble eightfold path.

original: nāryāṣṭāṅgamārgatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrāryāṣṭāṅgamārgatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
