analyzed: na ārya aṣṭāṅga mārga tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ārya aṣṭāṅga mārga tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the noble eightfold path is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the noble eightfold path.

original: nāryāṣṭāṅgamārgadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrāryāṣṭāṅgamārgadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽nāryasatyāni prajñāpāramitā nānyatrāryasatyebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ārya aṣṭāṅga mārga dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ārya aṣṭāṅga mārga dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na ārya satyāni prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ārya satyebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the noble eightfold path is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the noble eightfold path.🔽The noble truths are not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the noble truths.

original: nāryasatyatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrāryasatyatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ārya satya tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ārya satya tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the noble truths is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the noble truths.

original: nāryasatyadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrāryasatyadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ārya satya dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ārya satya dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The reality of the noble truths is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the reality of the noble truths.

original: na dhyānāni prajñāpāramitā nānyatra dhyānebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na dhyānāni prajñāpāramitā na anyatra dhyānebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The concentrations are not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the concentrations.

original: na dhyānatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra dhyānatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na dhyāna tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra dhyāna tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the concentrations is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the concentrations.

original: na dhyānadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra dhyānadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽nāpramāṇāni prajñāpāramitā nānyatrāpramāṇebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na dhyāna dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra dhyāna dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na apramāṇāni prajñāpāramitā na anyatra apramāṇebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma of the concentrations is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma of the concentrations.🔽The immeasurables are not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the immeasurables.

original: nāpramāṇatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrāpramāṇatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na apramāṇa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra apramāṇa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the immeasurables is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the immeasurables.

original: nāpramāṇadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrāpramāṇadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽nārūpyasamāpattayaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatrārūpyasamāpattibhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na apramāṇa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra apramāṇa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na ārūpya samāpattayaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ārūpya samāpattibhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma of the immeasurables is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma of the immeasurables.🔽The formless attainments are not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the formless attainments.

original: nārūpyasamāpattitathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrārūpyasamāpattitathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ārūpya samāpatti tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ārūpya samāpatti tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the formless attainments is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the formless attainments.

original: nārūpyasamāpattidharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrārūpyasamāpattidharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ārūpya samāpatti dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ārūpya samāpatti dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the formless attainments is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the formless attainments.

original: na vimokṣāḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vimokṣebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vimokṣāḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vimokṣebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The liberations are not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the liberations.

original: na vimokṣatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vimokṣatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vimokṣa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vimokṣa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the liberations is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the liberations.

original: na vimokṣadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vimokṣadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽nānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatrānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vimokṣa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vimokṣa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na anupūrva vihāra samāpattayaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra anupūrva vihāra samāpattibhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the liberations is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the liberations.🔽The successive absorptions are not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the successive absorptions.

original: nānupūrvavihārasamāpattitathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrānupūrvavihārasamāpattitathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na anupūrva vihāra samāpatti tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra anupūrva vihāra samāpatti tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the successive absorptions is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the successive absorptions.

original: nānupūrvavihārasamāpattidharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrānupūrvavihārasamāpattidharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na anupūrva vihāra samāpatti dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra anupūrva vihāra samāpatti dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the successive absorptions is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the successive absorptions.

original: na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhāni prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā  na śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukha tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukha tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The emptiness, signless, and wishless doors to liberation are not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the emptiness, signless, and wishless doors to liberation.🔽The suchness of the emptiness, signless, and wishless doors to liberation is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the emptiness, signless, and wishless doors to liberation.

original: na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukha dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukha dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The true nature of the emptiness, signless, and wishless doors to liberation is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the true nature of the emptiness, signless, and wishless doors to liberation.

original: nābhijñāḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatrābhijñāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽nābhijñātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrābhijñātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na abhijñāḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra abhijñāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na abhijñā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra abhijñā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The higher knowledges are not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the higher knowledges.🔽The suchness of the higher knowledges is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the higher knowledges.

original: nābhijñādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrābhijñādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāiamitā /
analyzed: na abhijñā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra abhijñā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāiamitā
translated: The true nature of the higher knowledges is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the true nature of the higher knowledges.

original: na samādhayaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra samādhibhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na samādhayaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra samādhibhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The concentrations are not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the concentrations.

original: na samādhitathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra samādhitathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na samādhi tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra samādhi tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of concentration is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of concentration.

original: na samādhidharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra samādhidharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na dhāraṇīmukhāni prajñāpāramitā nānyatra dhāraṇīmukhebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na samādhi dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra samādhi dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na dhāraṇīmukhāni prajñāpāramitā na anyatra dhāraṇīmukhebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of concentration is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of concentration.🔽The dhāraṇī gateways are not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: na dhāraṇīmukhatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra dhāraṇīmukhatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na dhāraṇīmukha tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra dhāraṇīmukha tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the dhāraṇī gateways is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: na dhāraṇīmukhadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra dhāraṇīmukhadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na tathāgatabalāni prajñāpāramitā nānyatra tathāgatabalebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na tathāgatabalatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra tathāgatabalatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na dhāraṇīmukha dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra dhāraṇīmukha dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na tathāgata balāni prajñāpāramitā na anyatra tathāgata balebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā  na tathāgata bala tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra tathāgata bala tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the dhāraṇī gateways is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the dhāraṇī gateways.🔽The powers of the Tathāgata are not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the powers of the Tathāgata.🔽The suchness of the powers of the Tathāgata is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the powers of the Tathāgata.

original: na tathāgatabaladharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra tathāgatabaladharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na tathāgata bala dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra tathāgata bala dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the powers of the Tathāgata is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the powers of the Tathāgata.

original: na vaiśāradyāni prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vaiśāradyebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vaiśāradyāni prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vaiśāradyebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The fearlessnesses are not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the fearlessnesses.

original: na vaiśāradyatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vaiśāradyatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vaiśāradya tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vaiśāradya tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the fearlessnesses is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the fearlessnesses.

original: na vaiśāradyadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vaiśāradyadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na pratisaṃvidaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra pratisaṃvidbhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vaiśāradya dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vaiśāradya dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na pratisaṃvidaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra pratisaṃvidbhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of the fearlessnesses is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of the fearlessnesses.🔽The detailed and thorough knowledges are not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: na pratisaṃvittathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra pratisaṃvittathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na pratisaṃvid tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra pratisaṃvid tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the detailed and thorough knowledges is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: na pratisaṃviddharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra pratisaṃviddharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na mahāmaitrī prajñāpāramitā nānyatra mahāmaitryāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na pratisaṃvid dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra pratisaṃvid dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na mahāmaitrī prajñāpāramitā na anyatra mahāmaitryāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of the detailed and thorough knowledges is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of the detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽Great love is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than great love.

original: na mahāmaitrītathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra mahāmaitrītathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na mahā maitrī tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra mahā maitrī tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of great love is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of great love.

original: na mahāmaitrīdharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra mahāmaitrīdharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na mahākaruṇā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra mahākaruṇāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na mahā maitrī dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra mahā maitrī dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na mahā karuṇā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra mahā karuṇāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of great loving kindness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of great loving kindness.🔽Great compassion is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than great compassion.

original: na mahākaruṇātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra mahākaruṇātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na mahā karuṇā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra mahā karuṇā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of great compassion is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of great compassion.

original: na mahākaruṇādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra mahākaruṇādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na mahā karuṇā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra mahā karuṇā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of great compassion is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of great compassion.

original: nāveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatrāveṇikabuddhadharmebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽nāveṇikabuddhadharmatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrāveṇikabuddhadharmatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na āveṇika buddha dharmāḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra āveṇika buddha dharmebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā  na āveṇika buddha dharma tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra āveṇika buddha dharma tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The unique qualities of a buddha are not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the unique qualities of a buddha.🔽The suchness of the unique qualities of a buddha is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the unique qualities of a buddha.

original: nāveṇikabuddhadharmadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrāveṇikabuddhadharmadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na āveṇika buddha dharma dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra āveṇika buddha dharma dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the unique qualities of a buddha is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the unique qualities of a buddha.

original: na sarvajñatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sarvajñatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na sarvajña tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sarvajña tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: Omniscience is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than omniscience.

original: na sarvajñatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sarvajñatātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na sarvajña tā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sarvajña tā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of omniscience is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of omniscience.

original: na sarvajñatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sarvajñatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na mārgākārajñatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra mārgākārajñatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na sarvajña tā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sarvajña tā dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na mārga ākāra jña tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra mārga ākāra jña tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of omniscience is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of omniscience.🔽The knowledge of path aspects is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the knowledge of path aspects.

original: na mārgākārajñatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra mārgākārajñatātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na mārga ākāra jña tā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra mārga ākāra jña tā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the knowledge of path aspects is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the knowledge of path aspects.

original: na mārgākārajñatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra mārgākārajñatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na sarvākārajñatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na mārga ākāra jña tā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra mārga ākāra jña tā dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na sarva ākāra jña tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sarva ākāra jña tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of the knowledge of path aspects is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of the knowledge of path aspects.🔽Omniscience is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than omniscience.

original: na sarvākārajñatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sarvākārajñatātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na sarva ākāra jña tā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sarva ākārajña tā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of omniscience is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of omniscience.

original: na sarvākārajñatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sarvākārajñatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na sarva ākārajña tā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sarva ākārajña tā dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of omniscience is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of omniscience.

original: tat kasya hetoḥ /
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ
translated: Why is that?

original: tathā hi kauśika sarva ete dharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante /🔽evaṃ sarvadharmeṣv asaṃvidyamāneṣv anupalambhamāneṣu na rūpaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra rūpāt prajñāpāramitā /🔽na rūpatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: tathā hi kauśika sarve ete dharmāḥ na saṃvidyante na upalabhyante  evam sarva dharmeṣu a saṃvidyamāneṣu an upalambhamāneṣu na rūpam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra rūpāt prajñāpāramitā  na rūpa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra rūpa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: It is because all these dharmas do not exist and are not perceived.🔽Thus, when all dharmas do not exist and are not perceived, form is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than form.🔽The suchness of form is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the suchness of form.

original: na rūpadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra rūpadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na vedanā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vedanāyā prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na rūpa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra rūpa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na vedanā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-nature of form is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the dharma-nature of form.🔽Feeling is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than feeling.

original: na vedanātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vedanātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vedanā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vedanā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of feeling is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the suchness of feeling.

original: na vedanādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vedanādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na saṃjñā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra saṃjñāyā prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vedanā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vedanā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na saṃjñā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra saṃjñāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-nature of feeling is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the dharma-nature of feeling.🔽Perception is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than perception.

original: na saṃjñātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra saṃjñātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na saṃjñā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra saṃjñā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of perception is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the suchness of perception.

original: na saṃjñādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra saṃjñādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na saṃskārāḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra saṃskārebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na saṃskāratathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra saṃskāratathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na saṃjñā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra saṃjñā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na saṃskārāḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra saṃskārebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā  na saṃskāra tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra saṃskāra tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of perception is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of perception.🔽Form is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than form.🔽The suchness of form is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of form.

original: na saṃskāradharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra saṃskāradharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na saṃskāra dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra saṃskāra dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of form is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of form.

original: na vijñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vijñānāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vijñānam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vijñānāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: Feeling is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than feeling.

original: na vijñānatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vijñānatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vijñāna tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vijñāna tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of feeling is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of feeling.

original: na vijñānadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vijñānadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vijñāna dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vijñāna dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of feeling is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of feeling.

original: na cakṣuḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra cakṣuṣaḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na cakṣustathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra cakṣustathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra cakṣuṣaḥ prajñāpāramitā 🔽na cakṣuḥ tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra cakṣuḥ tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: Perception is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than perception.🔽The suchness of perception is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of perception.

original: na cakṣurdharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra cakṣurdharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra cakṣuḥ dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the eye is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the eye.

original: na śrotraṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śrotrāt prajñāpāramitā /🔽na śrotratathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śrotratathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śrotram prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śrotrāt prajñāpāramitā  na śrotra tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śrotra tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The ear is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the ear.🔽The suchness of the ear is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the ear.

original: na śrotradharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śrotradharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śrotra dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śrotra dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the ear is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the ear.

original: na ghrāṇaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ghrāṇāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ghrāṇam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ghrāṇāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: The nose is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the nose.

original: na ghrāṇatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ghrāṇatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na ghrāṇadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ghrāṇadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ghrāṇa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ghrāṇa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na ghrāṇa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ghrāṇa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the nose is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the nose.🔽The dharmatā of the nose is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the nose.

original: na jihvā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jihvāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na jihvā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jihvāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The tongue is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the tongue.

original: na jihvātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jihvātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na jihvā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jihvā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the tongue is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the tongue.

original: na jihvādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jihvādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na jihvā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jihvā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the tongue is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the tongue.

original: na kāyaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kāyāt prajñāpāramitā /🔽na kāyatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kāyatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na kāyaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kāyāt prajñāpāramitā  na kāya tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kāya tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The body is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the body.🔽The reality of the body is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the reality of the body.

original: na kāyadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kāyadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na kāya dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kāya dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-nature of the body is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-nature of the body.

original: na manaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra manasaḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na manastathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra manastathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na manaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra manasaḥ prajñāpāramitā  na manaḥ tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra manaḥ tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The mind is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the mind.🔽The reality of the mind is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the reality of the mind.

original: na manodharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra manodharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na rūpaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra rūpāt prajñāpāramitā /🔽na rūpatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na manaḥ dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra manaḥ dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na rūpam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra rūpāt prajñāpāramitā  na rūpa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra rūpa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-nature of the mind is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-nature of the mind.🔽Form is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than form.🔽The reality of form is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the reality of form.

original: na rūpadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra rūpadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na rūpa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra rūpa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-nature of form is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-nature of form.

original: na śabdaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śabdāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śabdaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śabdāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: Sound is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than sound.

original: na śabdatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śabdatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śabda tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śabda tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of sound is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of sound.

original: na śabdadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śabdadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śabda dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śabda dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of sound is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of sound.

original: na gandhaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra gandhāt prajñāpāramitā /🔽na gandhatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra gandhatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na gandhaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra gandhāt prajñāpāramitā  na gandha tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra gandha tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: Smell is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than smell.🔽The suchness of smell is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of smell.

original: na gandhadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra gandhadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na gandha dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra gandha dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of smell is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of smell.

original: na rasaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra rasāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na rasaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra rasāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: Taste is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than taste.

original: na rasatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra rasatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na rasa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra rasa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of taste is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of taste.

original: na rasadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra rasadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na sparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sparśāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na rasa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra rasa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na sparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sparśāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of taste is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of taste.🔽Touch is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than touch.

original: na sparśatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sparśatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na sparśa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sparśa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of touch is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of touch.

original: na sparśadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sparśadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na dharmāḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra dharmebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na sparśa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sparśa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na dharmāḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra dharmebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of contact.🔽The dharmas are not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmas.

original: na dharmatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra dharmatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na dharma tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra dharma tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of contact.🔽Form is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than form.🔽The suchness of form is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of form.

original: na dharmadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra dharmadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na cakṣurvijñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra cakṣurvijñānāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na dharma dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra dharma dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na cakṣuḥ vijñānam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra cakṣuḥ vijñānāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of form is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of form.🔽Eye consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than eye consciousness.

original: na cakṣurvijñānatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra cakṣurvijñānatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ vijñāna tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra cakṣuḥ vijñāna tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of eye consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of eye consciousness.

original: na cakṣurvijñānadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra cakṣurvijñānadharmatāyaḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ vijñāna dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra cakṣuḥ vijñāna dharma tā ayaḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of eye consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of eye consciousness.

original: na śrotravijñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śrotravijñānāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śrotra vijñānam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śrotra vijñānāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: Ear consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than ear consciousness.

original: na śrotravijñānatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śrotravijñānatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śrotra vijñāna tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śrotra vijñāna tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of ear consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of ear consciousness.

original: na śrotravijñānadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śrotravijñānadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na ghrāṇavijñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ghrāṇavijñānāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śrotra vijñāna dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śrotra vijñāna dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na ghrāṇa vijñānam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ghrāṇa vijñānāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of ear consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of ear consciousness.🔽Nose consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than nose consciousness.

original: na ghrāṇavijñānatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra 🔽ghrāṇavijñānatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ghrāṇa vijñāna tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra  ghrāṇa vijñāna tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of nose consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of nose consciousness.

original: na ghrāṇavijñānadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ghrāṇavijñānadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na jihvāvijñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jihvāvijñānāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ghrāṇa vijñāna dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ghrāṇa vijñāna dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na jihvā vijñānam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jihvā vijñānāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of nose consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of nose consciousness.🔽Tongue consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than tongue consciousness.

original: na jihvāvijñānatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jihvāvijñānatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na jihvā vijñāna tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jihvā vijñāna tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of tongue consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of tongue consciousness.

original: na jihvāvijñānadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jihvāvijñānadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na jihvā vijñāna dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jihvā vijñāna dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of tongue consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of tongue consciousness.

original: na kāyavijñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kāyavijñānāt prajñāpāramitā /🔽na kāyavijñānatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kāyavijñānatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na kāya vijñānam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kāya vijñānāt prajñāpāramitā  na kāya vijñāna tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kāya vijñāna tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The wisdom pāramitā is not body consciousness, nor is it other than body consciousness.🔽The wisdom pāramitā is not the suchness of body consciousness, nor is it other than the suchness of body consciousness.

original: na kāyavijñānadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kāyavijñānadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na manovijñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra manovijñānāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na kāya vijñāna dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kāya vijñāna dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na manaḥ vijñānam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra manaḥ vijñānāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: The wisdom pāramitā is not the dharmatā of body consciousness, nor is it other than the dharmatā of body consciousness.🔽The wisdom pāramitā is not mind consciousness, nor is it other than mind consciousness.

original: na manovijñānatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra manovijñānatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na manaḥ vijñāna tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra manaḥ vijñāna tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The wisdom pāramitā is not the suchness of mind consciousness, nor is it other than the suchness of mind consciousness.

original: na manovijñānadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra manovijñānadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra cakṣuḥsaṃsparśāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na manaḥ vijñāna dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra manaḥ vijñāna dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na cakṣuḥ saṃsparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra cakṣuḥ saṃsparśāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: The wisdom pāramitā is not the dharmatā of mind consciousness, nor is it other than the dharmatā of mind consciousness.🔽The wisdom pāramitā is not eye contact, nor is it other than eye contact.

original: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra cakṣuḥsaṃsparśatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The wisdom pāramitā is not the suchness of eye contact, nor is it other than the suchness of eye contact.

original: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra cakṣuḥsaṃsparśadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śrotrasaṃsparśāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na śrotra saṃsparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śrotra saṃsparśāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of eye contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the dharmatā of eye contact.🔽Ear contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than ear contact.

original: na śrotrasaṃsparśatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śrotrasaṃsparśatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śrotra saṃsparśa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śrotra saṃsparśa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of ear contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the suchness of ear contact.

original: na śrotrasaṃsparśadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śrotrasaṃsparśadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śrotra saṃsparśa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śrotra saṃsparśa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of ear contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the dharmatā of ear contact.

original: na ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ghrāṇasaṃsparśāt prajñāpāramitā /🔽na ghrāṇasaṃsparśatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ghrāṇasaṃsparśatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na ghrāṇasaṃsparśadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ghrāṇasaṃsparśadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ghrāṇa saṃsparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ghrāṇa saṃsparśāt prajñāpāramitā  na ghrāṇa saṃsparśa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ghrāṇa saṃsparśa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na ghrāṇa saṃsparśa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ghrāṇa saṃsparśa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: Nose contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than nose contact.🔽The suchness of nose contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the suchness of nose contact.🔽The dharmatā of nose contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the dharmatā of nose contact.

original: na jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jihvāsaṃsparśāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na jihvā saṃsparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jihvā saṃsparśāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: Tongue contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than tongue contact.

original: na jihvāsaṃsparśatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jihvāsaṃsparśatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na jihvā saṃsparśa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jihvā saṃsparśa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of tongue contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of tongue contact.

original: na jihvāsaṃsparśadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jihvāsaṃsparśadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na jihvā saṃsparśa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jihvā saṃsparśa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The true dharmic nature of tongue contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the true dharmic nature of tongue contact.

original: na kāyasaṃsparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kāyasaṃsparśāt prajñāpāramitā /🔽na kāyasaṃsparśatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kāyasaṃsparśatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na kāya saṃsparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kāya saṃsparśāt prajñāpāramitā  na kāya saṃsparśa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kāya saṃsparśa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: Body contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than body contact.🔽The suchness of body contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of body contact.

original: na kāyasaṃsparśadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kāyasaṃsparśadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na kāya saṃsparśa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kāya saṃsparśa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The true dharmic nature of body contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the true dharmic nature of body contact.

original: na manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra manaḥsaṃsparśāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na manaḥ saṃsparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra manaḥ saṃsparśāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: Mind contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than mind contact.

original: na manaḥsaṃsparśatathatā prajñāpāramitā 🔽nānyatra manaḥsaṃsparśatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na manaḥ saṃsparśa tathatā prajñāpāramitā  na anyatra manaḥ saṃsparśa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of mind contact is not the perfection of wisdom,🔽nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of mind contact.

original: na manaḥsaṃsparśadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra manaḥsaṃsparśadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na manaḥ saṃsparśa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra manaḥ saṃsparśa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The true dharmic nature of mind contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the true dharmic nature of mind contact.

original: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The eye-contact-conditioned feeling is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the eye-contact-conditioned feeling.🔽The suchness of the eye-contact-conditioned feeling is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the eye-contact-conditioned feeling.

original: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na śrotra saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śrotra saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituition of the eye-contact-conditioned feeling is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituition of the eye-contact-conditioned feeling.🔽The ear-contact-conditioned feeling is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the ear-contact-conditioned feeling.

original: na śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śrotra saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śrotra saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the ear-contact-conditioned feeling is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the ear-contact-conditioned feeling.

original: na śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śrotra saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śrotra saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituition of the ear-contact-conditioned feeling is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituition of the ear-contact-conditioned feeling.

original: na ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ghrāṇa saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ghrāṇa saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The nose-consciousness element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the nose-consciousness element.

original: na ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ghrāṇa saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ghrāṇa saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na ghrāṇa saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ghrāṇa saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the nose-consciousness element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the suchness of the nose-consciousness element.🔽The true nature of the nose-consciousness element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the true nature of the nose-consciousness element.🔽The tongue-consciousness element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the tongue-consciousness element.🔽The suchness of the tongue-consciousness element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the suchness of the tongue-consciousness element.

original: na jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The true nature of the tongue-consciousness element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the true nature of the tongue-consciousness element.

original: na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The feeling that arises from contact with the body is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the feeling that arises from contact with the body.🔽The suchness of the feeling that arises from contact with the body is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the feeling that arises from contact with the body.

original: na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-nature of the feeling that arises from contact with the body is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-nature of the feeling that arises from contact with the body.🔽The feeling that arises from contact with the mind is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the feeling that arises from contact with the mind.🔽The suchness of the feeling that arises from contact with the mind is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the feeling that arises from contact with the mind.

original: na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-nature of the feeling that arises from contact with the mind is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-nature of the feeling that arises from contact with the mind.

original: na pṛthivīdhātuḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra pṛthivīdhātoḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na pṛthivī dhātuḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra pṛthivī dhātoḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The earth element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the earth element.

original: na pṛthivīdhātutathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra pṛthivīdhātutathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na pṛthivī dhātu tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra pṛthivī dhātu tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the earth element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the earth element.

original: na pṛthivīdhātudharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra pṛthivīdhātudharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na pṛthivī dhātu dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra pṛthivī dhātu dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-nature of the earth element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-nature of the earth element.

original: nābdhātuḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatrābdhātoḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ap dhātuḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ap dhātoḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The water element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the water element.

original: nābdhātutathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrābdhātutathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ap dhātu tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ap dhātu tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the water element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the water element.

original: nābdhātudharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrābdhātudharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ap dhātu dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ap dhātu dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-nature of the water element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-nature of the water element.

original: na tejodhātuḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra tejodhātoḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na tejaḥ dhātuḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra tejaḥ dhātoḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The fire element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the fire element.

original: na tejodhātutathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra tejodhātutathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na tejaḥ dhātu tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra tejaḥ dhātu tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the fire element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the fire element.

original: na tejodhātudharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra tejodhātudharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na tejaḥ dhātu dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra tejaḥ dhātu dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-nature of the fire element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-nature of the fire element.

original: na vāyudhātuḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vāyudhātoḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vāyu dhātuḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vāyu dhātoḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The wind element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the wind element.

original: na vāyudhātutathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vāyudhātutathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vāyu dhātu tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vāyu dhātu tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the wind element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the wind element.

original: na vāyudhātudharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vāyudhātudharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vāyu dhātu dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vāyu dhātu dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of the wind element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of the wind element.

original: nākāśadhātuḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatrākāśadhātoḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ākāśa dhātuḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ākāśa dhātoḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The space element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the space element.

original: nākāśadhātutathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrākāśadhātutathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ākāśa dhātu tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ākāśa dhātu tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the space element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the space element.

original: nākāśadhātudharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrākāśavīdhātudharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ākāśa dhātu dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ākāśa vī dhātu dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of the space element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of the space element.

original: na vijñānadhātuḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vijñānadhātoḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vijñāna dhātuḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vijñāna dhātoḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The consciousness element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the consciousness element.

original: na vijñānadhātutathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vijñānadhātutathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vijñāna dhātu tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vijñāna dhātu tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the consciousness element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the consciousness element.

original: na vijñānadhātudharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vijñānadhātudharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vijñāna dhātu dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vijñāna dhātu dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of the consciousness element is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of the consciousness element.

original: nāvidyā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrāvidyāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽nāvidyātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrāvidyātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na avidyā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra avidyāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na avidyā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra avidyā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: Ignorance is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than ignorance.🔽The suchness of ignorance is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of ignorance.

original: nāvidyādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrāvidyādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na avidyā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra avidyā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of ignorance is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of ignorance.

original: na saṃskārāḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra saṃskārebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na saṃskāratathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra saṃskāratathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na saṃskārāḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra saṃskārebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā  na saṃskāra tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra saṃskāra tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: Formations are not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than formations.🔽The suchness of formations is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of formations.

original: na saṃskāradharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra saṃskāradharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na saṃskāra dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra saṃskāra dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of formations is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of formations.

original: na vijñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vijñānāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vijñānam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vijñānāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: Consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than consciousness.

original: na vijñānatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vijñānatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vijñāna tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vijñāna tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of consciousness.

original: na vijñānadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vijñānadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vijñāna dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vijñāna dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-constituent of consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of consciousness.

original: na nāmarūpaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra nāmarūpāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na nāma rūpam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra nāma rūpāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: Form is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than form.

original: na nāmarūpatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra nāmarūpatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na nāma rūpa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra nāma rūpa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of form is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of form.

original: na nāmarūpadharmatā
analyzed: na nāma rūpa dharma tā
translated: The dharma-constituent of form

original: prajñāpāramitā nānyatra nāmarūpadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na ṣaḍāyatanaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ṣaḍāyatanāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā na anyatra nāma rūpa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na ṣaṣ āyatanam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ṣaṣ āyatanāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of form.🔽The six sense fields are not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the six sense fields.

original: na ṣaḍāyatanatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ṣaḍāyatanatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ṣaṣ āyatana tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ṣaṣ āyatana tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the six sense fields is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the six sense fields.🔽The dharma-constituent of the six sense fields

original: na ṣaḍāyatanadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra ṣaḍāyatanadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na ṣaṣ āyatana dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra ṣaṣ āyatana dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of the six sense fields.

original: na sparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sparśāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na sparśaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sparśāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: Contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than contact.

original: na sparśatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sparśatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na sparśa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sparśa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of contact is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of contact.🔽The dharma-constituent of contact

original: na sparśadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sparśadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na sparśa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra sparśa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharma-constituent of contact.

original: na vedanā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na vedanātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vedanātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vedanā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vedanāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na vedanā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vedanā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: Feeling is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than feeling.🔽The suchness of feeling is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the suchness of feeling.

original: na vedanādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vedanādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na tṛṣṇā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra tṛṣṇāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vedanā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vedanā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na tṛṣṇā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra tṛṣṇāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-nature of feeling is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the dharma-nature of feeling.🔽Craving is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than craving.

original: na tṛṣṇātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra tṛṣṇātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na tṛṣṇā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra tṛṣṇā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of craving is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the suchness of craving.

original: na tṛṣṇādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra tṛṣṇādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na tṛṣṇā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra tṛṣṇā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-nature of craving is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the dharma-nature of craving.

original: nopādānaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatropādānāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na upādānam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra upādānāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: Clinging is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than clinging.

original: nopādānatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatropādānatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na upādāna tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra upādāna tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of clinging is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the suchness of clinging.

original: nopādānadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatropādānadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na upādāna dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra upādāna dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharma-nature of clinging is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the dharma-nature of clinging.

original: na bhavaḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra bhavāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na bhavaḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra bhavāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: Becoming is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than becoming.

original: na bhavatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra bhavatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na bhava tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra bhava tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of becoming is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of becoming.

original: na bhavadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra bhavadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na jātiḥ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jāteḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na bhava dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra bhava dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na jātiḥ prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jāteḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmic nature of becoming is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmic nature of becoming.🔽Birth is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than birth.

original: na jātitathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jātitathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na jāti tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jāti tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of birth is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of birth.

original: na jātidharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jātidharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na jarāmaraṇaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jarāmaraṇāt prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na jāti dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jāti dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na jarā maraṇam prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jarā maraṇāt prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmic nature of birth is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmic nature of birth.🔽Old age and death are not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than old age and death.

original: na jarāmaraṇatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jarāmaraṇatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na jarā maraṇa tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jarā maraṇa tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of old age and death is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of old age and death.

original: na jarāmaraṇadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra jarāmaraṇadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na jarā maraṇa dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra jarā maraṇa dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmic nature of old age and death is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmic nature of old age and death.

original: na dānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra dānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na dāna pāramitā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra dāna pāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The perfection of giving is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the perfection of giving.

original: na dānapāramitātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra dānapāramitātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na dāna pāramitā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra dāna pāramitā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the perfection of generosity is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the perfection of generosity.

original: na dānapāramitādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra dānapāramitādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na dāna pāramitā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra dāna pāramitā dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the perfection of generosity is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the perfection of generosity.

original: na śīlapāramitā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śīlapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na śīlapāramitātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śīlapāramitātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na śīla pāramitā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śīla pāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na śīla pāramitā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śīla pāramitā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The perfection of morality is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the perfection of morality.🔽The suchness of the perfection of morality is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the perfection of morality.

original: na śīlapāramitādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra śīlapāramitādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na kṣāntipāramitā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kṣāntipāramitāyāḥ
analyzed: na śīla pāramitā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra śīla pāramitā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na kṣānti pāramitā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kṣānti pāramitāyāḥ
translated: The dharmatā of the perfection of morality is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the perfection of morality.🔽The perfection of patience is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the perfection of patience.

original: pāramitā / na kṣāntipāramitātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kṣāntipāramitātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: pāramitā na kṣānti pāramitā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kṣānti pāramitā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the perfection of patience is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the suchness of the perfection of patience.

original: na kṣāntipāramitādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra kṣāntipāramitādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na kṣānti pāramitā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra kṣānti pāramitā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The dharmatā of the perfection of patience is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom elsewhere than the dharmatā of the perfection of patience.

original: na vīryapāramitā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vīryapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na vīryapāramitātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vīryapāramitātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vīrya pāramitā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vīrya pāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na vīrya pāramitā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vīrya pāramitā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The perfection of perseverance is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the perfection of perseverance.🔽The suchness of the perfection of perseverance is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the suchness of the perfection of perseverance.

original: na vīryapāramitādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vīryapāramitādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na vīrya pāramitā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra vīrya pāramitā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The true nature of the perfection of perseverance is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the true nature of the perfection of perseverance.

original: na dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na dhyānapāramitātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra dhyānapāramitātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na dhyāna pāramitā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra dhyāna pāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na dhyāna pāramitā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra dhyāna pāramitā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The perfection of concentration is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the perfection of concentration.🔽The suchness of the perfection of concentration is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the suchness of the perfection of concentration.

original: na dhyānapāramitādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra dhyānapāramitādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /🔽na prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na dhyāna pāramitā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra dhyāna pāramitā dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā  na prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The true nature of the perfection of concentration is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the true nature of the perfection of concentration.🔽The perfection of wisdom is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the perfection of wisdom.

original: na prajñāpāramitātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra prajñāpāramitātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na prajñāpāramitā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra prajñāpāramitā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The suchness of the perfection of wisdom is not the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the suchness of the perfection of wisdom.

original: na prajñāpāramitādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra prajñāpāramitādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na prajñāpāramitā dharma tā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra prajñāpāramitā dharma tāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not the dharmatā of the perfection of wisdom, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the dharmatā of the perfection of wisdom.

original: nādhyātmaśūnyatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrādhyātmaśūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na adhyātma śūnyatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra adhyātma śūnyatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not internal emptiness, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than internal emptiness.

original: nādhyātmaśūnyatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrādhyātmaśūnyatātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na adhyātma śūnyatā tathatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra adhyātma śūnyatā tathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not the suchness of internal emptiness, nor is the perfection of wisdom other than the suchness of internal emptiness.

original: nādhyātmaśūnyatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatrādhyātmaśūnyatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
analyzed: na adhyātma śūnyatā dharmatā prajñāpāramitā na anyatra adhyātma śūnyatā dharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā
